original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 諾德人是天際省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黃。他們強壯、耐勞又耐寒，是著名的天生戰士。只消發出一聲戰吼，敵人就會嚇得逃竄。

original: In addition to their quick and perceptive grasp of spellcraft, even the humblest of Bretons can boast a resistance to shock attacks. They are particularly skilled at conjuration magic.
string: 布萊頓人不僅對魔法悟性極佳，而且對於電擊傷害有著特殊的抵抗力。他們特別擅長施展召喚系法術。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 諾德人是天際省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黃。他們強壯、耐勞又耐寒，是著名的天生戰士。只消發出一聲戰吼，敵人就會嚇得逃竄。

original: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.
string: 在故鄉晨風省，他們被稱作「丹莫」。暗精靈的過人之處在於他們的力量和魔法技藝。他們天生對火焰有高抵抗力，並且能召喚先祖之怒，使全身環繞著火焰。

original: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.
string: 在故鄉晨風省，他們被稱作「丹莫」。暗精靈的過人之處在於他們的力量和魔法技藝。他們天生對火焰有高抵抗力，並且能召喚先祖之怒，使全身環繞著火焰。

original: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.
string: 賽瑞迪爾省的在地居民，全都是狡猾的老油條和商人。他們的作戰和魔法技能卓越。只要是可能找到金幣的地方，帝國人總能找到更多。他們能使用帝王之聲使敵人冷靜下來。

original: The people of the Wrothgarian and Dragontail Mountains, Orcish smiths are prized for their craftsmanship. Orc troops in Heavy Armor are among the finest in the Empire, and are fearsome when using their Berserker Rage.
string: 來自沃斯格理安和龍尾山脈的部族。獸人鐵匠的手藝出眾，善於修理各種護甲和武器。穿戴重型護甲的獸人士兵是帝國前線部隊的主力，而當獸人戰士們進入狂暴狀態時，更讓敵人聞風喪膽。

original: Also known as "Altmer" in their homeland of Summerset Isle,  the high elves are the most strongly gifted in the arcane arts of all the races. They can call upon their Highborn power to regenerate magicka quickly.
string: 在故鄉夏暮島，他們被稱為「傲爾特莫」。高等精靈在所有種族中擁有最強的魔法天賦。他們能使用名為「高貴血統」的特殊能力，使法力恢復速度加快。

original: The most naturally talented warriors in Tamriel, the Redguards of Hammerfell have a hardy constitution and a natural resistance to poison. They can call upon an Adrenaline Rush in combat.
string: 身為泰姆瑞爾最有天賦的戰士，落錘省的紅衛人有堅強的體質和對毒素的抵抗力。他們能在戰鬥中使用特殊能力「腎上腺素效應」。

original: This reptilian race, well-suited for the treacherous swamps of their Black Marsh homeland, has developed a natural resistance to diseases and the ability to breathe underwater. They can call upon the Histskin to regenerate health very quickly.
string: 有著近似於爬蟲類外觀的種族。這使他們能適應故鄉黑沼澤的危險沼地。亞龍人具備了對疾病的自然抵抗力和在水下呼吸的能力。他們能使用「希樹之膚」特殊能力，提高生命力恢復速度。

original: In addition to their quick and perceptive grasp of spellcraft, even the humblest of High Rock's Bretons can boast a resistance to magic. Bretons can call upon the Dragonskin power to absorb spells.

The Nirnroot Missive Revised Edition By Sinderion

[pagebreak]

[pagebreak] The following is a transcript of the speech given by Master Alchemist Sinderion at the Alchemical Symposium on Rain's Hand of 4E 02. It is a revised version of an earlier missive Sinderion gave to the same group several years before. We've done the best we could to preserve the original tone of his speech, but some light embellishments have been made for editorial reasons and for clarity. Sharmirin Raythorne, Imperial Scribe [pagebreak] would like to address the Symposium today with some startling revelations regarding the nirnroot. Although this curiously tenacious flora grows almost anywhere a significant body of water is present, it's extremely rare, and soon to become extinct. After years of extensive research, and the tireless efforts of my field assistant, I came into the possession of a large sampling of nirnroot. According to the theories presented by the noted Imperial Herbalist Chivius Regelliam, the nirnroot once flourished until a cataclysmic event severely reduced their numbers. Although many scholars reject the proposal that the Sun's Death event of 1E 668 catastrophically affected plant life, Chivius felt that the nirnroot's normal growth cycle was interrupted by the lack of sun for a full year. Whereas other plant species tend to "find a way," the nirnroot's mysterious magical nature made it especially susceptible to this climate shift. While this may or may not be the case, it's certainly true that the recorded sightings of nirnroot are declining as the years pass. Chivius's notes oddly describe the nirnroot as emitting a "brilliant yellowish glow." Contrary to this fact, the nirnroot of today has a soft, haunting blue-white glow. Subsequent studies by other scholars have failed to adequately explain this shift in hue. I propose that the nirnroot sensed its own impending extinction and therefore altered its metabolism in order to survive. One of the most glaring pieces of evidence of my theory is the presence of nirnroot in subterranean environments... places completely devoid of sunlight. Strangely, Chivius's notes fail to mention even a single instance of a subterrestrial nirnroot. How could this be? How could a surface-dwelling plant suddenly begin appearing in new locations radically different from its normal habitat? The answer, my fellow alchemists, is ironically concealed within Chivius's own notes. Although he spends a great deal of time experimenting with the nirnroot in his laboratory, he overlooked an important part of a plant's growth cycle... its soil. Chivius was correct in assuming the volcanic eruption of Red Mountain contributed to the demise of the nirnroot, but I believe the ash from that mighty explosion did more than simply cloud the skies. When mixed with the fertile soil of Cyrodiil, this fine powder is the true cause of the nirnroot's astounding metamorphosis. Although little volcanic ash from that dark time remains, I have performed tests on samples sent to me from Vvardenfell. Careful scrutiny of the samples revealed that they were rife with "ash salt," a highly magical substance. Dunmer native to the Vvardenfell region were known to have used ash salt as an ingredient to cure the "Blight," an awful disease which decimated their realm hundreds of years ago. This unique property of the ash salt coupled with the nirnroot's inherent magic caused the radical change... in essence; the root "healed itself." In summation, it's clear that the nirnroot was dying and used a byproduct of its destructor to preserve itself. I feel the nirnroot has accomplished in a relatively short amount of time what it would take other species thousands of years to complete. Whether you subscribe to my theory or not, one thing is certain; the nirnroot is on a path to destruction. It contains untapped potential to create potions the likes of which have never been seen in our day. I propose to you today that we divert a small portion of our funds to an expedition to collect some of these roots to study. I have outlined this proposal for your perusal after this section of the Symposium. Please, seriously consider this proposal before it becomes too late, and the nirnroot becomes nothing but a memory. Thank you for your time.

奈恩根信函 修訂版 作者 辛德里昂

[pagebreak]

[pagebreak] 以下為鍊金術大師辛德里昂於第四紀元02年雨手月，在鍊金術研討會演講的抄錄內容。這是根據多年前辛德里昂給予同一個團體的一份早期信函修改而成。我們已盡可能保留他當初演講時的語氣，但為了編輯方便並求清晰易懂，內容有稍加修飾。 帝國學士 夏米林．雷索恩 筆 [pagebreak] 今天，我想在研討會上披露一些關於奈恩根的驚人事實。 雖然任何夠大的水域都可能長出這種生命力意外頑強的植物，但它卻極為稀有，而且即將滅種。經過多年的廣泛研究，加上我的田野調查助理努力不懈，我終於取得大量奈恩根樣本。根據知名的帝國草藥師奇維烏斯．雷杰廉提出的說法，曾經繁盛一時的奈恩根，是因為遇上一場災難性變故而數量驟減。據說第一紀元668年發生的日殤事件對植物造成災難性的影響，儘管許多學者不接受這個假說，奇維烏斯卻認為，整年缺乏日照打亂了奈恩根的正常生長週期。這場變故中，其他植物企圖「尋找出路」，但奈恩根因其難以解釋的神奇特性，特別容易受到氣候變遷的影響。真相是否如此，我們不得而知，但可以確定的是奈恩根的目擊紀錄確實連年減少。 引人好奇的是，奇維烏斯的筆記提到奈恩根會散發「亮黃色光芒」。這跟現今散發著柔和又魅惑的藍白光芒的奈恩根完全不一樣。其他學者的後續研究都無法充分解釋這個顏色上的轉變。我大膽假設奈恩根是因為感受到即將到來的滅絕危機，為了生存下去而改變自體的新陳代謝。支持這項理論最顯著的證據之一，就是奈恩根生長的地下環境......是完全沒有日照的地方。奇怪的是，奇維烏斯的筆記絲毫沒有提到生長在地下的奈恩根。怎麼會有這等事？一種生長於地面的植物，怎麼會突然出現在與原本生長環境大相逕庭的地方？ 各位鍊金術士，說來諷刺，答案其實就藏在奇維烏斯的筆記之中。雖然他花了大把時間在實驗室研究奈恩根，卻忽略了植物生長週期很重要的一部分......土壤。奇維烏斯的假定指出紅山的火山噴發造成奈恩根死亡，這點沒有錯，但我相信這場巨大爆發噴發出來的火山灰造成的影響，遠遠不止於遮蔽天空。在火山灰混入了賽瑞迪爾的肥沃土壤後，這些細微粉末才是造成奈恩根驚人突變的真正原因。雖然那段黑暗時期留下來的火山灰很稀少，但我從瓦登費爾取得了樣本並進行實驗。仔細研究這些樣本後，我發現樣本充滿了「灰鹽」，這是一種很神奇的物質。據說住在瓦登費爾地區的丹莫人會使用灰鹽做為治療「枯病」的材料，這種可怕疾病曾在數百年前肆虐他們的土地。灰鹽的奇異特性遇上奈恩根的天生魔力，引發了這種巨變......其實就是奈恩根「自癒」了。 總而言之，奈恩根在瀕死之際，用這場天災的副產品來保全自己的性命。在我看來，奈恩根以相對短的時間，完成了其他物種可能要花上數千年才能獲得的演化。 無論你是否贊同我的理論，有件事是可以確定的，奈恩根正一步步邁向滅絕。這種植物擁有許多未開發的潛力，可用來製造曠古絕今的藥水。我想在此刻提議，運用我們一小部分資金來組成考察隊，前往採集奈恩根供作研究。我已經擬好一份提案，供各位在這堂研討會結束後好好研究，還請各位認真考慮我的提案，免得奈恩根成為追憶，一切就為時晚矣。 感謝各位的參與。

original:
Tamrielic Artifacts

The following are notes I have gathered, over the past centuries, of items of unimaginable significance. All have been seen, owned, and lost, again and again throughout Tamriel. Some may be myth, others may be hoax, but regardless, many have lost their lives attempting to find or protect these very coveted items.

[pagebreak]

Lord's Mail

Sometimes called the Armor of Morihaus or the gift of Kynareth, this is an ancient cuirass of unsurpassable quality. It grants the wearer power to absorb health, resist the effects of spells, and cure oneself of poison when used. It is said that whenever Kynareth deigns the wearer unworthy, the Lord's Mail will be taken away and hidden for the next chosen one.

[pagebreak]

Ebony Mail

The Ebony Mail is a breastplate created before recorded history by the Dark Elven goddess Boethiah. It is she who determines who should possess the Ebony Mail and for how long a time. If judged worthy, its power grants the wearer added resistance of fire, magicka, and grants a magical shield. It is Boethiah alone who determines when a person is ineligible to bear the Ebony Mail any longer, and the goddess can be very capricious.

[pagebreak]

Spell Breaker

Spell Breaker, superficially a Dwemer tower shield, is one of the most ancient relics of Tamriel. Aside from its historical importance in the Battle of Rourken-Shalidor, the Spell Breaker protects its wielder almost completely from any spell caster, either by reflecting magicks or silencing any mage about to cast a spell. It is said that Spell Breaker still searches for its original owner, and will not remain the property of anyone else for long. For most, possessing Spell Breaker for any length of time is power enough.

[pagebreak]

Chrysamere

The Paladin's Blade is an ancient claymore with offensive capabilities surpassed only by its own defenses. It lends the wielder health, protects him or her from fire, and reflects any spells cast against the wielder back to the caster. Seldom has Chrysamere been wielded by any bladesman for any length of time, for it chooses not to favor one champion.

[pagebreak]

Staff of Magnus

The Staff of Magnus, one of the elder artifacts of Tamriel, was a metaphysical battery of sorts for its creator, Magnus. When used, it absorbs an enemy's health and mystical energy. In time, the Staff will abandon the mage who wields it before he becomes too powerful and upsets the mystical balance it is sworn to protect.

[pagebreak]

Warlock's Ring

The Warlock's Ring of the Archmage Syrabane is one of the most popular relics of myth and fable. In Tamriel's ancient history, Syrabane saved all of the continent by judicious use of his Ring, and ever since, it has helped adventurers with less lofty goals. It is best known for its ability to reflect spells cast at its wearer and to improve his or her speed and to restore health. No adventurer can wear the Warlock's Ring for long, for it is said that the Ring is Syrabane's alone to command.

[pagebreak]

Ring of Phynaster

The Ring of Phynaster was made hundreds of years ago by a man who needed good defenses to survive his adventurous life. Thanks to the Ring, Phynaster lived for hundreds of years, and since then it has passed from person to person. The Ring improves its wearer's overall resistance to poison, magicka, and shock. Still, Phynaster was cunning and cursed the ring so that it eventually disappears from its holder's possessions and returns to another resting place, discontent to stay anywhere but with Phynaster himself.

[pagebreak]

Ring of Khajiit

The Ring of the Khajiit is an ancient relic, hundreds of years older than Rajhin, the thief that made the Ring famous. It was Rajhin who used the Ring's powers to make himself invisible and as quick as the breath of wind. Using the Ring, he became the most successful burglar in Elsweyr's history. Rajhin's eventual fate is a mystery, but according to legend, the Ring rebelled against such constant use and disappeared, leaving Rajhin helpless before his enemies.

[pagebreak]

Mace of Molag Bal

Also known as the Vampire's Mace, the Mace of Molag Bal drains its victims of magicka and gives it to the bearer. It also has the ability to transfer an enemy's strength to its wielder. Molag Bal has been quite free with his artifact. There are many legends about the Mace. It seems to be a favorite for vanquishing wizards.

[pagebreak]

Masque of Clavicus Vile

Ever the vain one, Clavicus Vile made a masque suited to his own personality. The bearer of the Masque is more likely to get a positive response from the people of Tamriel. The higher his personality, the larger the bonus. The best known story of the Masque tells the tale of Avalea, a noblewoman of some renown. As a young girl, she was grossly disfigured by a spiteful servant. Avalea made a dark deal with Clavicus Vile and received the Masque in return. Though the Masque did not change her looks, suddenly she had the respect and admiration of everyone. A year and a day after her marriage to a well connected baron, Clavicus Vile reclaimed the Masque. Although pregnant with his child, Avalea was banished from the Baron's household. Twenty one years and one day later, Avalea's daughter claimed her vengeance by slaying the Baron.

[pagebreak]

Mehrunes Razor

The Dark Brotherhood has coveted this ebony dagger for generations. This mythical artifact is capable of slaying any creature instantly. History does not record any bearers of Mehrune's Razor. However, the Dark Brotherhood was once decimated by a vicious internal power struggle. It is suspected that the Razor was involved.

[pagebreak]

Cuirass of the Savior's Hide

Another of Hircine's artifacts was the Cuirass of the Savior's Hide. The Cuirass has the special ability to resist magicka. Legend has it that Hircine rewarded his peeled hide to the first and only mortal to have ever escaped his hunting grounds. This unknown mortal had the hide tailored into this magical Cuirass for his future adventures. The Savior's Hide has a tendency to travel from hero to hero as though it has a mind of its own.

[pagebreak]

Spear of Bitter Mercy

One of the more mysterious artifacts is the Spear of Bitter Mercy. Little to nothing is known about the Spear. There are no recorded histories but many believe it to be of Daedric origin. The only known legend about it is its use by a mighty hero during the fall of the Battlespire. The hero was aided by the Spear in the defeat of Mehrunes Dagon and the recapturing of the Battlespire. Since that time, the Spear of Bitter Mercy has made few appearances within Tamriel.

[pagebreak]

Daedric Scourge

The Daedric Scourge is a mighty mace forged from sacred ebony in the Fires of Fickledire. The legendary weapon of Mackkan, it was once a fierce weapon used to send spirits of black back into Oblivion. The weapon has the ability to summon creatures from Oblivion, Once a tool used against the Daedric Lords in the Battlespire, it now roams the land with adventurers.

[pagebreak]

Bow of Shadows

Legend has it that the Bow of Shadows was forged by the Daedra Nocturnal. The legendary ranger, Raerlas Ghile, was granted the Bow for a secret mission that failed, and the Bow was lost. Raerlas did not go down without a hearty fight and is said to have, with the aid of the Bow, taken scores of his foes with him. The Bow grants the user the ability of invisibility and increased speed. Many sightings of the Bow of Shadows have been reported, and it is even said that the sinister Dark Elf assassin of the Second Era, Dram, once wielded this bow.

[pagebreak]

Fists of Randagulf

Randagulf of Clan Begalin goes down in Tamrielic history as one of the mightiest warriors from Skyrim. He was known for his courage and ferocity in battle and was a factor in many battles. He finally met his fate when King Harald conquered Skyrim. King Harald respected this great hero and took Randagulf's gauntlets for his own. After King Harald died, the gauntlets disappeared. The King claimed that the Fists granted the bearer added strength.

[pagebreak]

Ice Blade of the Monarch

The Ice Blade of the Monarch is truly one of Tamriel's most prized artifacts. Legend has it that the Evil Archmage Almion Celmo enchanted the claymore of a great warrior with the soul of a Frost Monarch, a stronger form of the more common Frost Atronach. The warrior, Thurgnarr Assi, was to play a part in the assassination of a great king in a far off land, and become the new leader. The assassination failed and the Archmage was imprisoned. The Ice Blade freezes all who feel its blade. The Blade circulates from owner to owner, never settling in one place for long.

[pagebreak]

Ring of Surroundings

Little is known of this prize but it is said that it lends the wearer the ability to blend in with their surroundings.

[pagebreak]

Boots of the Apostle

The Boots of the Apostle are a true mystery. The wearer of the boots is rumored to be able to levitate, though nobody has ever seen them used.

[pagebreak]

The Mentor's Ring

This ring is a prized possession for any apprentice to magic. It lends the wearer the ability to increase their intelligence and wisdom, thus making their use of magic more efficient. The High Wizard Carni Asron is said to be the creator of the Ring. It was a construct for his young apprentices while studying under his guidance. After Asron's death, the Ring and several other possessions vanished and have been circulated throughout Tamriel.

[pagebreak]

Ring of the Wind

No facts are known about this Ring, but the title and the few rumors lend one to think it grants the wearer added speed.

[pagebreak]

Vampiric Ring

One of the more deadly and rare artifacts in Tamriel is the Vampiric Ring. It is said that the Ring has the power to steal its victim's health and grant it to the wearer. The exact nature and origin of the Ring is wholly unknown, but many elders speak of its evil creation in Morrowind long, long ago by a cult of Vampire followers. The Vampiric Ring is an extremely rare artifact and is only seen every few hundred cycles of the moons.

[pagebreak]

Eleidon's Ward

Eleidon was a holy knight of legend in Breton history. He was a sought after man for his courage and determination to set all wrongs right. In one story, it is said that he rescued a Baron's daughter from sure death at the hands of an evil warlord. For his reward, the Baron spent all of his riches to have an enchanted shield built for Eleidon. The Shield granted Eleidon the opportunity to heal his wounds.

[pagebreak]

Staff of Hasedoki

Hasedoki was said to have been a very competitive wizard. He wandered the land in search for a wizard who was greater than he. To the best of all knowledge, he never found a wizard who could meet up to his challenge. It is said that he felt so lonely and isolated because so many feared his power, that he bonded his life-force into his very own staff, where his soul remains to this very day. Magic users all over Tamriel have been searching for this magical staff. Granting its wielder a protection of magicka, it is a sure prize for any magic user.

[pagebreak]

Bloodworm Helm

The King of Worms was said to have left behind one of his prized possessions, the Bloodworm Helm. The Helm is a construct of magically formed bone. The Helm allows the user to summon skeletons and control the undead. It would be a prized artifact to a necromancer.

[pagebreak]

Dragonbone Mail

This cuirass is one of the greatest artifacts any collector or hero could own. It is constructed of real dragon bone and was enchanted by the first Imperial Battlemage, Zurin Arctus, in the early years of the Third Era. It is a truly exquisite piece of work and many have sought to possess it. The properties of the Cuirass allow the wearer to resist fire, and to damage an enemy with a blast of fire. Little is known about the involvement of Zurin Arctus with the enchantment of the Cuirass, but an old tale speaks of a debt that he owed to a traveling warrior. Like the warrior, the Dragonbone Mail never stays put for long.

[pagebreak]

Skull Crusher

The Skull Crusher is an amazingly large, and powerful weapon. The Warhammer was created in a fire, magically fueled by the Wizard, Dorach Gusal, and was forged by the great weaponsmith, Hilbongard Rolamus. The steel is magically hardened and the weight of the weapon is amazingly light, which makes for more powerful swings and deadly blows. The Warhammer was to be put on display for a festival, but thieves got it first. The Skull Crusher still travels Tamriel in search of its creators.

[pagebreak]

Goldbrand

This magical Sword is almost a complete mystery. Thieves tell tales about its golden make and how it was actually forged by ancient dragons of the North. Their tales claim that it was given to a great knight who was sworn to protect the dragons. The Sword lends its wielder the ability to do fire damage on an enemy. Goldbrand has not been sighted in recent history and is said to be awaiting a worthy hero.

[pagebreak]

Fang of Haynekhtnamet

Black Marsh was once known to be inhabited with what the Argonians called the Wamasus. Northern men considered them to be intelligent dragons with lightning for blood. One such mighty beast, Haynekhtnamet, was slain by the Northern men, though it took 7 days and nights, and a score of men. One of the surviving men took a fang home as a trophy. The fang was carved down into a blade and fashioned into a small dagger. The Dagger mysteriously houses some of the beast's magical properties and grants the user the ability to do shock damage on an opponent. This unique Dagger is seen occasionally by traveling heroes.

[pagebreak]

Umbra Sword

The Umbra Sword was enchanted by the ancient witch Naenra Waerr, and its sole purpose was the entrapment of souls. Used in conjunction with a soul gem, the Sword allows the wielder the opportunity to imprison an enemy's soul in the gem. Naenra was executed for her evil creation, but not before she was able to hide the Sword. The Umbra Sword is very choosy when it comes to owners and therefore remains hidden until a worthy one is found.

[pagebreak]

Denstagmer's Ring

All that is known of this Ring is that it may grant the user protection from certain elements. Even the name Denstagmer is a mystery.

[pagebreak]

Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw

One of Valenwood's legendary heroes is Oreyn Bearclaw. Son of King Faume Toad-Eye, he was a respected clan hunter and a future leader. Wood Elven legend claims Oreyn single handedly defeated Glenhwyfaunva, the witch-serpent of the Elven wood, forever bringing peace to his clan. Oreyn would go on to accomplish numerous other deeds, eventually losing his life to the Knahaten Flu. His Helm stood as a monument of his stature for future generations to remember. The Helm was lost eventually, as the Clan split, and is now a treasured artifact for adventurers. The Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw is rumored to improve the wearer's agility and endurance.

[pagebreak]

Daedric Crescent Blade

Probably the most rare and even outlawed item of all the great prizes is the Daedric Crescent Blade. The Blade was used by Mehrunes Dagon's Daedric forces in the capture of the Imperial Battlespire. These extremely unique Blades were gathered up and destroyed after the Battlespire was recaptured by the Empire. All but one it seems. Though the Empire believes them all to be destroyed, it is rumored that one still remains in existence, somewhere in Tamriel, though none have ever seen it. The Blade lends its wielder the ability to do great damage on an enemy and allows him to paralyze and put heavy wear on his enemy's armor. Quite the prize for any mighty warrior, if it does indeed exist.
string:
泰姆瑞爾文物

以下是我過去幾世紀收集到的筆記，記載著重要性超乎想像的物品。這些物品遍布泰姆瑞爾各地，曾被人發現、收藏，再流落他方，一次又一次。有些物品可能存在於神話之中，有些可能到頭來是場騙局。許多人力圖尋找或保護這樣人人覬覦的物品，並在過程中丟了性命。

[pagebreak]

聖主鏈甲

此古老胸甲有時又稱莫利奧斯的護甲或凱娜瑞絲的饋贈，品質無與倫比。穿戴此胸甲者可吸取生命力、抵抗法術效果，並為自己解毒。據說每當凱娜瑞絲認為穿戴者不配擁有這件聖主鏈甲時，鏈甲就會消失，等待下個被選中的人出現。

[pagebreak]

黑檀鏈甲

黑檀鏈甲是黑暗精靈女神波耶西亞創造的胸甲，時間早於任何記載的歷史。誰能擁有黑檀鏈甲，又能擁有多長時間，都是由她決定。如果女神認為鏈甲穿戴者具有資格，鏈甲就會賦予那人火焰和法力抗性，並賜予魔盾。穿戴者是否有資格繼續擁有鏈甲，全憑波耶西亞決定，而這位女神有時可是相當不講道理的。

[pagebreak]

破術盾

外表看起來像鍛莫塔盾的破術盾，是最古老的泰姆瑞爾聖器之一。破術盾在洛肯沙利多之戰奠定了重大歷史意義，能反彈法力，或讓即將施法的法師噤聲，保護持有者不受幾乎所有法術影響。據說破術盾仍在尋找自己原有的主人，因此停留在他人身邊的時間不會太久。而對大多數人來說，無論時間長短，能擁有破術盾已是足夠強大的事了。

[pagebreak]

克薩米爾劍

這把聖殿騎士之刃是古老的雙刃寬劍。除非再出現同樣一把劍，否則沒有其他劍能擋下其攻擊的威力。此劍賦予持有者生命，保護持有者免受火焰傷害。任何對持有者施展的法術都會反彈回施術者身上。鮮少有人能長時間保有此劍，因它選擇不去擁護任何一名戰士。

[pagebreak]

瑪格努斯之杖

瑪格努斯之杖是泰姆瑞爾最古老的文物之一。創造者瑪格努斯創造了此杖，用來儲存其力量。使用時，它會吸收敵人的生命力和神秘能量。隨著時間過去，持有此杖的法師會變得過於強大，打破此杖誓言守護的神秘平衡。因此法杖會在此事發生之前拋棄持有者。

[pagebreak]

巫師的指環

首席法師席拉班恩的巫師指環，是最受歡迎的神話與寓言聖物之一。泰姆瑞爾的古老歷史裡，席拉班恩使用指環的明智審慎之舉拯救了整個大陸。且自那時起，指環也開始幫助其他目標較平凡的冒險家。指環最出名的特點就是能反彈對穿戴者施展的法術，並提升其速度、恢復生命力。冒險家能配戴指環的時間不長，原因在於據說只有席拉班恩一人能對指環發號施令。

[pagebreak]

費納斯特指環

費納斯特指環是在數百年前製成，製作的冒險家想藉此獲得強大的防護力保命。多虧了這枚指環，費納斯特活了數百年，之後指環又傳給好幾個人。配戴指環能提升對毒素、法力和電擊的整體抗性。不過狡猾的費納斯特對指環下了詛咒，所以指環最終會從持有人的手中消失，回到另一座安息地，唯有和費納斯特待在一起它才甘心。

[pagebreak]

虎人的指環

虎人的指環是古代遺物，比讓指環出名的小偷拉津還老上好幾百歲。拉津靠指環的力量隱形且來去如風。他靠指環成為艾斯維爾史上最成功的竊賊。拉津最後下落成謎，但據傳說所言，由於拉津使用過度頻繁，指環決定消失反抗，讓拉津在敵人面前手足無措。

[pagebreak]

莫拉格．巴爾釘錘

莫拉格．巴爾釘錘也稱作吸血鬼釘錘，能吸收受害者的法力，再轉移到持有者身上。也能夠將敵人的力量轉移到持有者身上。莫拉格．巴爾用起文物毫不手軟。關於釘錘有很多傳說，看來這把釘錘特別常用來消滅巫師。

[pagebreak]

克拉維克斯．瓦爾的面具

愛慕虛榮的克拉維克斯．瓦爾做了一張很符合他個性的面具。戴上面具比較有機會得到泰姆瑞爾人的青睞。畢竟個性越鮮明的人就越吃香。這張面具有個最出名的故事，主角是小有名氣的貴婦亞薇里雅。她年輕時殘遭懷恨在心的僕人毀容。亞薇里雅因此去找克拉維克斯．瓦爾談了一樁黑暗交易，以此換來面具。雖然面具並未改變她的面容，她卻贏得了所有人的尊重和愛慕。後來她與一位人脈廣闊的公爵結婚一年又一天後，克拉維克斯．瓦爾就拿回了面具。即便亞薇里雅懷著公爵的子嗣，還是被趕出了家門。二十一年又一天後，亞薇里雅的女兒殺了公爵，替母親報了仇。

[pagebreak]

梅魯涅斯的利刃

黑暗兄弟會世世代代都在覬覦這把黑檀匕首。這個神秘的文物能瞬間殺死任何生物。文獻上並沒有記載梅魯涅斯的利刃的持有人，但黑暗兄弟會曾因為內鬨惡鬥，損失了一大批人。有人懷疑這把利刃與此事有關。

[pagebreak]

救世主皮革胸甲

救世主皮革胸甲也是海爾辛的文物。這件胸甲有抵抗法力的特殊能力。據傳海爾辛將他的皮革送給了第一位、也是唯一一位成功逃離他狩獵場的人類。這位身份不明的人類將皮革製成了具法力的胸甲，以應付未來的冒險。救世主皮革通常在英雄間相傳，好像有著自己的意志。

[pagebreak]

苦澀仁慈之矛

苦澀仁慈之矛堪稱最神秘的文物，大家對這把長矛所知甚少。雖然沒有文獻記載，但許多人認為長矛源自魔族。根據目前唯一知道的一則傳說，有位威猛的英雄在征戰尖塔淪陷時用了這把長矛。英雄借助長矛之力，打敗了梅魯涅斯．大袞，奪回征戰尖塔。自此，苦澀仁慈之矛就鮮少在泰姆瑞爾出現。

[pagebreak]

魔族之錘

魔族之錘是用聖黑檀以菲克戴爾之火鑄成，威力無窮。這把瑪肯的傳奇武器力量強大，曾用來將黑靈遣送回湮滅領域。這把武器能從湮滅領域召喚生物，曾在征戰尖塔用來對抗魔族領主，現在則跟著冒險家雲遊四方。

[pagebreak]

暗影弓

據傳暗影弓是由魔族諾克圖娜爾鑄成。傳奇遊俠瑞拉斯．吉勒為了執行秘密任務，拿到了這把弓，但任務失敗後，弓也消失無蹤。瑞拉斯在死前奮力一搏，據說靠著暗影弓殺死了數十個敵人。這把弓可以讓使用者隱形並提高速度。很多人都說看過暗影弓，據說連邪惡的第二紀元暗精靈殺手德拉姆都拿過這把弓。

[pagebreak]

藍達格爾夫拳套

貝加林家族的藍達格爾夫，堪稱泰姆瑞爾史上最威猛的天際省戰士。他戰鬥時以膽識和殘暴聞名，是好幾場戰役的致勝關鍵。他最終死於哈拉爾德王征服天際省之時。哈拉爾德王相當敬重這位英雄，便將藍達格爾夫的拳套收為己有。哈拉爾德王死後，拳套也不翼而飛。這位君王宣稱戴上拳套能提高力量。

[pagebreak]

君主冰鋒

君主冰鋒可說是泰姆瑞爾最珍貴的文物。據傳邪惡的首席法師亞迷翁．瑟莫利用霜君的靈魂，對偉大戰士的雙刃寬劍施了咒，那可是比寒霜元素還要強大的型態。這位戰士圖格納爾．亞西要到遠方的國度暗殺一位大王，並取而代之成為新的領袖。暗殺最終失敗，法師也受到監禁。日後被冰鋒碰到的人都會凍結。冰鋒一再易主，從不會留在同個地方太久。

[pagebreak]

環境指環

大家對這件珍品的認識不多，但據說戴了能夠融入環境。

[pagebreak]

使徒靴

使徒靴全然是個謎。據說穿了靴子能夠浮到空中，但沒人看過有誰真的穿上那雙靴子。

[pagebreak]

導師的指環

這枚指環對魔法學徒來說是很珍貴的物品。戴了能夠提高智力和智慧，運用魔法的效率更高。據說這枚指環是高等巫師卡爾尼．亞斯榮為了他的年輕學徒所製作。亞斯榮死後，指環和他手上其他物品消失，在泰姆瑞爾四處流轉。

[pagebreak]

風之指環

眾人對這枚指環一無所知，但從名稱和幾則謠言判斷，穿戴後應該能提高速度。

[pagebreak]

吸血鬼指環

吸血鬼指環是泰姆瑞爾十分致命且稀有的文物。據說指環能夠竊取受害者的生命值，再轉移給佩戴的人。指環的特性和起源完全不明，但許多長者都說，指環是很久很久以前一群吸血鬼的追隨者在晨風省打造而成。吸血鬼指環是極為稀有的文物，要等月相經過幾百個輪迴才能見到一次。

[pagebreak]

伊萊頓的防護

伊萊頓是布萊頓史上的傳奇聖騎士。他因為具備膽識和斬妖除惡的決心，受到許多人喜愛。據說他曾經從邪惡軍閥的手中，救出了原本必死無疑的公爵女兒。公爵隨後費盡畢生積蓄製作施了法的盾牌，贈予伊萊頓以回報他的義舉。盾牌讓伊萊頓在作戰途中能有時間療傷。

[pagebreak]

哈塞朵其法杖

哈塞朵其據說是個非常好勝的巫師，他四處尋找比自己厲害的巫師。就目前所知，他從未找到能勝過他的巫師。據說因為許多人都很害怕他的能力，他感到十分孤立，所以將自己的生命力和法杖合而為一。他的靈魂至今仍棲身在法杖裡。泰姆瑞爾各地會施展魔法的人都在尋覓這把魔杖。拿起法杖就能抵禦法力，對施展魔法的人而言可是相當珍貴的法器。

[pagebreak]

血蟲頭盔

據說蛆蟲之王留下了一件珍貴財寶，就是血蟲頭盔。頭盔是用魔法形塑的骨骼製成，戴上頭盔就能召喚骷髏，並控制不死生物。對死靈術士來說，這是一件十分珍貴的文物。

[pagebreak]

龍骨鏈甲

這件胸甲在收藏家和英雄的眼裡，都是厲害無比的文物。胸甲用真正的龍骨製成，在第三紀元初年由第一位帝國戰鬥法師祖林．亞克圖司施咒。作工十分精細，許多人都想收為己有。穿戴這件特殊的胸甲可抵禦火焰，還能噴火對敵人造成傷害。眾人不太清楚祖林．亞克圖司為何會對胸甲施法，但有個古老傳說提到他欠了一位旅人戰士的人情。龍骨鏈甲和那位戰士一樣，從不會在同個地方待上太久。

[pagebreak]

碎顱者

碎顱者是一件體積龐大、威力十足的武器。這把戰錘是頂尖武器匠希爾邦格德．羅拉姆斯，在巫師多拉克．古薩爾以法力助燃的火焰中鑄成。鋼鐵經過法力加持提高硬度，拿起來卻奇輕無比，揮舞起來威力強大，能使出致命一擊。戰錘原本要在慶典時展示，卻被小偷捷足先登。碎顱者仍在泰姆瑞爾四處移動，想找到自己的創造者。

[pagebreak]

金印武士刀

這把魔刀可說是個謎。小偷間流傳的故事交待了黃金的刀身，以及刀其實是由北方古龍鑄造而來的過程。故事提到武士刀交給了一位誓言保衛龍群的頂尖騎士。揮舞武士刀能夠對敵人造成火焰傷害。近代歷史沒有金印武士刀的目擊紀錄，據說武士刀還在等待配得上自己的英雄。

[pagebreak]

黑涅赫納美龍之牙

據說黑沼曾住著亞龍人稱為瓦瑪素斯的生物。北方人認為牠們是聰穎的嗜血龍族，其中威猛的黑涅赫納美龍被北方人所殺，耗時七天七夜，許多人因此犧牲。有位活下來的人拔下一顆龍牙，帶回家作為戰利品。龍牙被開了鋒，做成小型匕首。神秘的是，匕首還具有猛龍的魔力，使用起來能對敵人造成電擊傷害。有時會在雲遊的英雄身上看到這把獨特的匕首。

[pagebreak]

暗影劍

暗影劍由古代女巫寧拉．維爾施咒，唯一的用途就是囚禁靈魂。此劍搭配靈魂石，有機會將敵人的靈魂囚禁到石中。寧拉因為創造了這把邪惡的劍而遭到處決，卻在死前將劍藏了起來。暗影劍對主人十分挑剔，在找到夠格的主人前絕不輕易現身。

[pagebreak]

丹仕塔格莫的指環

大家只知道佩戴上這枚指環就能抵抗特定元素。就連名字「丹仕塔格莫」都是個謎。

[pagebreak]

奧林．熊爪之盔

奧林．熊爪是威木省的一位傳奇英雄。他是國王佛姆．蟾蜍眼的兒子，是受人敬重的氏族獵人和接班人。木精靈的傳說提到奧林獨身打敗了精靈森林的蛇魔女格倫威法恩瓦，為氏族帶來了永久的和平。奧林後續又完成了許多成就，最終罹患克拿哈頓流感而喪命。這頂頭盔象徵了他的偉大，供未來的世世代代留念。最終氏族分裂，頭盔也消失無蹤，冒險家視之為珍貴的文物。據傳戴上奧林．熊爪之盔能提高敏捷和耐力。

[pagebreak]

魔族新月劍

魔族新月劍在所有奇珍異品中算得上是最稀有的一件，這把劍甚至是非法物品。梅魯涅斯．大袞的魔族軍隊在佔領帝國征戰尖塔時，用的就是這種劍。帝國奪回征戰尖塔後，將這種獨一無二的劍全部收集起來銷毀，唯獨漏了一把。雖然帝國認為已全數銷毀，但謠傳還有一把在泰姆瑞爾某處，只是沒人見過。這把劍能夠對敵人造成大量傷害，還能麻痺敵人，嚴重破壞敵人的護甲。如果這把劍確實存在，對威武的戰士來說可是個寶藏。

original: Absorb <20> magicka per second. If the target is out of magicka, absorb health instead.
string: 每秒吸取<20>點法力。如果目標法力耗盡，則開始吸取生命力。

original: Absorbs the life essence of your foes. Strengthened by the blood of deceit.
string: 吸收敵人的生命之魂。受到欺騙之血強化。
梭默大使館，愛琳溫之光
精靈之牙．阿尼蒙柯洛裡

original: Stay here. This is your new home.
string: 待在這裡吧。這是你的新家。

original: You can return this axe to our friend. The esteemed Jarl of Windhelm has my answer. Make sure he gets it.
string: 你可以把這把斧頭送回給我們的朋友，作為對尊敬的風舵城領主的回答。一定要送到他手上。

original: I don't know how you convinced Ulfric to talk to the Empire. Worse than a waste of time if you ask me.
string: 我不知道你是怎麼說服烏弗瑞克跟帝國對話的。我覺得比浪費時間還糟糕。

original: Sure am! I thank my lucky stars every time I look to the night sky that Maven took me in and gave me this opportunity.
string: 當然開心了！我每次看著夜晚的星空時，都會感謝我的幸運，那就是瑪雯給了我在這裡工作的機會！

original: Ah, at last. I've been anxiously awaiting your return.
string: 啊，終於。我等你回來等得心急如焚。

original: If you think you can steal my throne by winning the hearts of the people, that's where you're wrong. Keep that in mind.
string: 你給我聽好了，要是你覺得這樣收買人心就能篡我的位，那你就大錯特錯了。
我已經把甜蜜灣買下了。

original: Don't worry, I'll come to this peace council of yours.
string: 別擔心，我會參加這場和睦的會議的。

original: A little boy who lived here. Aventus Aretino. He was nice, but really quiet, and sad, because his mother just died.
string: 一個曾住在這裡的小孩。阿文圖斯．艾瑞提諾。他人不錯，但是很少說話，因為他的母親去世了。

original: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; the people won't stop blathering about you.
string: 我的侍從告訴我，你已經給裂谷的人們留下了深刻的印象；人們都七嘴八舌的討論你。

original: But Samuel told me he's back home in Windhelm, and did some kind of dark ritual. He summoned killers to murder old Grelod. He's saved us all.
string: 但是薩穆埃爾告訴我他回到了風舵城的家中，然後搞了某種黑暗法式。他試圖召喚一些殺手來除掉老桂羅。他救了我們所有人。

original: Ah, the feisty goodwife. Quite the mouth on her. Someone must have wanted her dead... right?
string: 啊，暴躁的主婦。她的嘴真是不得了。肯定有人想要她死……對吧？

original: I apologize in advance for my husband's crankiness; I promise you he means well.
string: 我為我丈夫先前的固執道歉，我向你保證他的初衷是好的。

original: A few days ago, one of her servants busted through a wall into the Temple of Divines. We'll need you to go into the Catacombs themselves.
string: 幾天前，她的一個僕人鑽牆進了聖靈神殿。我們想請你親自進地下墓穴一趟。

original: Wait, you want me to go do this alone?
string: 等等，你的意思是要我一個人去做嗎？

original: I suppose it's time I gave him an answer...
string: 我想現在該給他一個答覆了……

original: Oh, Aventus Aretino. He was sent here when his mother died, but he ran away.
string: 哦，阿文圖斯．艾瑞提諾。他母親死後就被送到這裡，但是他逃走了。

original: Doesn't matter... the title is yours. I henceforth name you Thane of Riften. Don't disappoint me.
string: 無所謂……稱號是你的。我從今天開始任命你為裂谷城武衛。別讓我失望了啊。

original: I remember you... You were at Helgen with us! Come to join the war? Speak with Galmar. He handles the new recruits.
string: 我記得你……在聖地鎮的時候你跟我們在一起！來加入這場戰爭嗎？去找加爾瑪吧。他負責處理新人招募事宜。

original: Clean up that murderer's mess. (<Global=HDWindhelmKiller> gold)
string: 清理掉那個兇手的屍骨。（給予<Global=HDWindhelmKiller>金幣）

original: I have an important message from General Tullius.
string: 我有一份來自圖留斯將軍的重要密件給你。

original: I've spent years watching his techniques and learning his tricks. Sadly, I don't think I'll ever be as talented as he was.
string: 我花了好幾年的時間觀察他的技能，學習他的技巧。可惜的是我覺得我可能永遠也達不到他的水準。

original: Things are much better now that Grelod is dead, but still. I'm sick of this place.
string: 桂羅死了，一切都好多了。不過，我依然討厭這個地方。

original: I was told you could see my future.
She's an absolute pleasure to work for! In fact, I almost feel guilty accepting pay from her.
string: 為她工作很開心！事實上，我都不忍心找她要工錢。

original: That's it! Wonderful! I knew I could count on you.
string: 就是這個！太好了！我就知道可以相信你。

original: I've made up my mind, even if my advisors are still squabbling. I'm sending you to Windhelm.
string: 我決定了，即使我的顧問們還在爭吵不休，我還是打算派你去風舵城。

original: Well, well. Aren't we the overachiever. Three possibilities, three victims. Must have been one of them, right? So why take chances...
string: 很好，很好。我們真是賺大了。三種可能性，三個受害者。答案肯定就在他們當中，是吧？那做什麼還費勁去選……

original: Why are you here? Killing Gaius Maro is but the first step of your contract - you must also plant the incriminating letter on his body...
string: 你在這裡做什麼？除掉加留斯．馬洛只是契約的第一步——你還要把誣陷的信件塞到他身上……

original: Good. Being at the summoning created a connection to Potema, you are the one to do this.
string: 很好。你參與了招魂儀式，已經與波特瑪有了某種程度上的聯繫，因此你是這項任務的不二人選。
我已經把甜蜜灣買下了。

original: Indeed. But I abide only those whose will is aligned to my own. Those who oppose my desires perish in the most dreadful of ways.
string: 確實。但我只與那些和我意志相同的人共處。反對我的人將以最悲慘的方式滅亡。

original: Use it right, and you won't feel a thing.
string: 正確地使用，你就不會感覺到盔甲的負擔。

original: As to Potema herself, find what's left of her body, likely a skeleton. Remove it from the Catacombs and bring it back to be sanctified by Arkay.
string: 至於波特瑪，你去找到她的遺骸，可能已經變成一具屍骨。把她從地下墓穴中取出並帶回來，然後讓阿爾凱進行淨化。

original: What is it you want me to do?
Oh, goodness me. You're a friend of Gabriella's, then. Well, I guess we both know why you're here.
string: 噢，天哪！你是加布裡艾拉的朋友啊，原來。好吧，那我知道你為什麼到這裡來了。

original: I've been informed by my steward that you've made quite an impression in the Rift; several of our citizens have expressed their admiration.
string: 我的侍從告訴我，你已經給裂谷的人們留下了深刻的印象；我們有不少居民都對你表示欽佩。

original: You'll never see the sun again. No one escapes Cidhna Mine. No one.
string: 你可以跟陽光道別了。沒人逃得出希訥礦坑。從沒有。

original: As the Jarl of Riften, I feel it's my duty to honor your selfless behavior by honoring you with the title Thane of Riften.
string: 作為裂谷城領主，我必須向你那無私的行為致敬，而賦予你裂谷城武衛的稱號。

original: Well, I just never expected the Gourmet to be a Breton. It almost seems too obvious. Some of the greatest cooks have been Bretons, and...
string: 好吧，我確實沒想到你是個布萊頓人。不過其實很明顯啊，很多出色的廚師都是布萊頓人。而且……

original: No doubt requesting to garrison his men in my castle. How many times must I deny him?
string: 一定又是請求在我的城堡裡駐紮他的手下。這傢伙到底要我拒絕多少次？

original: The blubbering barbarian and the tenacious mother. Must have been one of them, right?
string: 愛哭的野蠻人或強橫的母親。你覺得是他們其中之一，對吧？

original: I've checked with my court and apparently you're fully eligible... there's nothing standing in the way of presenting you the title.
string: 我和我的上古議會商議過了，很顯然，你完全有資格……沒什麼可以妨礙你獲得這一頭銜。

original: Grelod... murdered. Here. I... I need... air... You... you... Get out of here! Get out!
string: 桂羅……被殺了。就在這裡。我……我需要……喘口氣……你……你……給我滾出去！出去！

original: On second thought, perhaps I'll invest another time.
string: 重新考慮一下，或許我另找時間再投資。

original: I have an important message for you.
string: 我有一個重要口信給你。

original: Well, I don't mean to seem disappointed, but... I just never figured the Gourmet was an Imperial. I had dreamed of something more exotic, maybe...
string: 我不不是失望，只不過……我確實沒想到美食家會是一位帝國本土居民。我曾經幻想過您是來自異國的……

original: When Aventus escaped, Grelod was so mad. I got double the beatings that day. But that won't happen ever again.
string: 阿文圖斯逃走後，桂羅就像發了瘋似的。那天我挨的打是以前的兩倍。不過那樣的事不會再發生了。

original: Thank the gods. I'll get to work on the Phial straight away.
string: 感謝神。我馬上去處理雪瓶。

original: And now that Potema has returned?
string: 現在波特瑪已經回歸了？

original: I have the materials you requested.
Just remember that you're only a part of my court, this doesn't make you one of the family.
string: 要記得你還只是我的一名臣屬，而不是我的家族成員。

original: Begone from here! Get out of this orphanage! Help!Somebody help me!
string: 走開！滾出孤兒院！天哪！有人救救我們嗎？

original: You've been a beacon of hope in these dark times for my people and I will never forget it.
string: 在這黑暗的時代裡，你簡直就是我們的希望之光，你的恩情我永遠不會忘記。

original: Come on, get the truth off your chest. (Persuade)
string: 來吧，把真相說出來吧。（說服）

original: Oh, yes. Of course... the whole thane thing. I'd forgotten. If you're ready then, can we get this out of the way?
string: 噢，是的。當然……武衛那件事嘛。我幾乎都忘了。要是你準備好了，那麼我們就來搞定這事吧？

original: Oh, well, it's just... I never imagined the Gourmet was a Khajiit. You know, because of all the fur, and the potential for getting hair in the...
string: 噢，好吧，只是……我從沒想過美食家是虎人。要知道，因為妳身上的皮毛，在做菜的時候可能會掉進……

original: When Aventus escaped, Grelod got meaner than ever. I really thought she was going to kill one of us. Guess not!
string: 自從阿文圖斯逃跑之後，桂羅就變得前所未有的殘暴。我當真以為她會殺了我們之中一人。好在沒有！

original: I'd like to make an investment in your business.
I can't believe it! Grelod is dead! She's really dead!
string: 簡直不敢相信！桂羅死了！她真的死了！

original: Deliver this axe to Ulfric Stormcloak.
string: 把這把斧頭送去給烏弗瑞克．風暴斗篷。

original: I have this token for you.
I can provide you with help for her minions though.  This should help you deal with the Catacombs themselves.
string: 雖然我幫你對付她的手下。這應該對你進入墓穴有所幫助。

original: Here, now tell me the truth. (<BribeCost> gold)
string: 錢在這，告訴我真相吧。（賄賂<BribeCost>金幣）

original: About that message from the General...
string: 關於那個來自將軍的口信……

original: It's just... Well... you're an Orc! Ha ha ha! If the people of the Empire only knew! I mean, now I understand your need for secrecy. Most would...
string: 那個……好吧……你是個獸人！哈哈哈，要是帝國上下所有的人知道這件事不知道會做何感想！我理解你要保持隱私的想法，畢竟大多數人會……

original: So, I've been hearing your name in court quite a bit lately.
string: 嗯，我才在宮廷裡聽說你的大名，有點兒孤陋寡聞了。

original: You have a task for me?
When Aventus took off, when he said those things, about killing Grelod... I never imagined he was serious...
string: 阿文圖斯逃走後，每當他談起要殺了桂羅時……我從沒想過他是認真的……

original: Aventus Aretino? He only lived here for awhile. I think his mother got sick and died or something. Anyway, he's gone now. He ran away.
string: 阿文圖斯．艾瑞提諾？他只在這裡住過一段時間。我想他的母親生病死了還是怎麼的。不管怎樣，現在他不在了。他逃走了。

original: I used to hate it here, but it's not so bad anymore. Constance is real good to us.
string: 我以前一直很討厭這裡，不過現在沒那麼糟了。康斯坦斯對我們真的很好。

original: Please, relax. Free your mind. Yes, that's it...
string: 請你放鬆，放開你的心靈。是的，就是那樣……

original: Summoned in spirit form is not raised from the dead. She'll need help before she can return to the living.
string: 招魂不是起死回生。讓她復活的話還需要一些幫助。

original: Well, I'm just surprised the Gourmet is a Redguard. I had you pegged for a Wood Elf, honestly. You know, because of your use of...
string: 好吧，我對美食家是個紅衛人感到很驚奇。我把你錯認成了木精靈，你知道的，因為你使用東西的方式……

original: Falk sent me to talk to you about Potema.
string: 佛可派我來跟你談談波特瑪的事情。

original: Talking peace with Ulfric? You must be an optimist.
string: 跟烏弗瑞克聊和平？你肯定是個樂觀主義者。

original: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.
string: 等我們處理了這頭龍的問題再說吧。

original: Balimund pulled me out of Grelod's orphanage when I was just a child. I don't know what he saw in me, but I was glad to get out of there.
string: 巴利穆德在我小時候把我從桂羅的孤兒院救了出來。我不知道他看上我哪裡，但還是很高興能離開那地方。

original: You... you're an Argonian! Where did you learn to cook like that? Surely not in Black Marsh. Why even the...
string: 不，你是個亞龍人！你是從那裡學會了這種烹飪食物的方法？絕對不是在黑沼澤吧！為什麼你甚至……

original: The conniving Khajiit. Cat like that was sure to have enemies. It's no wonder you chose him.
string: 陰險的虎人。像這樣的小貓肯定樹敵不少。你選他實在是意料之中。

original: Word out on the street is that he went home to Windhelm, and people have heard strange chanting coming from his house. Looks like he really did it!
string: 坊間傳說，他回到了風舵城的家，人們聽到你屋子裡傳出奇怪的歌聲。他真的再那麼做！

original: I heard he went back to his house in Windhelm, to try and get the Dark Brotherhood to come and murder Grelod. And... he actually pulled it off!
string: 我聽說他回到了風舵城的家中。試著把黑暗兄弟會的人請來，要他們殺死桂羅。然後……他真的做到了！

original: Jarl Ulfric Stormcloak asked me to deliver this axe to you.
string: 烏弗瑞克．風暴斗篷領主要我把這個斧頭給你。

original: I... Well, I just can't believe the Gourmet is a Dark Elf. How difficult it must have been for you in Morrowind. The food there is...
string: 我……我只是沒想到美食家是個暗精靈。你們在晨風省的生活一定很艱苦，那裡的食物……

original: Wait for me in the city...
string: 你先在城市裡等我一下……

original: Ah, there you are. I was wondering when you'd visit us again.
string: 啊，你來了，我剛剛還想著你什麼時候會再來見我們。

original: Therefore all that remains is to bestow it upon you.
string: 因此，最後一步就是要把它賜予給你。

original: Why, just this last week I was commenting to my fellow meadery workers just how lucky we are to be working for such a charitable family.
string: 真的，上星期我才向酒莊的伙伴說，為這寬容大量的家族做事有多幸運。

original: I don't have any money to give you. but I can show you a few tricks I learned playing for the Winterhold wizards.
string: 我沒有錢可以給你，但我可以教你一些我在為冬堡法師演奏時學到的技巧。

original: Oh ho. The whimpering Nord, eh? Yes, yes, I can see how you'd come to that conclusion. Interesting choice.
string: 噢不。哭泣的諾德人，哈？是啊，是啊，我明白你是怎麼得出那個結論的了。真是有趣的選擇。

original: Kill one person, and you can solve so many problems. I wonder at the possibilities.
string: 殺人可以解決很多問題。我只想知道可行性。

original: I should be the one thanking you. You've solved more problems in the short time you've been here then anyone in my court has their entire careers.
string: 我才應該說謝謝呢。你才來了這麼一陣子，就幫忙解決了那麼多問題，要是換作我的任何手下，肯定搞一輩子都搞不定。

original: Is there anything I can help Riften with?
string: 有什麼事情我可以幫到裂谷城的嗎？

original: When has any good ever come from talking to the Empire?
string: 跟帝國談判什麼時候得到過好處？

original: I guessed right! I... I always imagined the great Gourmet was a Wood Elf. You see, only someone with a knowledge of woodland herbs could combine...
string: 我猜對了！我……我就覺得美食家的出身應該是木精靈！你知道，只有一個熟知樹林香草的人能夠將那些東西結合起來……

original: Ah Potema. Former queen of Solitude and one of the most dangerous necromancers in recorded history.
string: 啊，波特瑪。獨孤城的前任皇后，史上最危險的死靈法師之一。

original: I'll come to your council. But I doubt any good will come of it.
string: 我會參加你的會議的。但是我懷疑這樣做能有什麼好處。

original: Therefore, by my authority as Jarl, I pronounce you Thane of Riften and award you all of the benefits befitting your station. Congratulations.
string: 因此，我以領主的身份宣佈，封你為裂谷城武衛，並賜予你一切應得的權益與獎賞。恭喜你。
很高興看見你如此開心。

original: I should slay you for such insolence!
string: 你該為你的傲慢無禮付出性命！

original: It's going to take a lot more than that.
You have some nerve coming back here after what you did to Keerava.
string: 你對基拉瓦做了那些事之後是不是有點神經過敏了。
是關於什麼的呢，我的女士？

original: Just... leave here! Leave us alone!
string: 離……離開這裡！離我們遠點！

original: Oh don't pretend to be modest. I'm talking about your new role as champion. Apparently, you've taken my people under your wing.
string: 噢你別太自謙了。我正在討論你勇士的新身份。很顯然，你非常關懷我的人民。

original: About that message from the General...
string: 關於那個來自將軍的口信……

original: No... no, that is all. Now... now please. I find myself very weary all of sudden.
string: 不……不，就這麼多了。現在……現在我，突然感覺非常累。

original: Hmm. The fearless wife and mother, and the underhanded Khajiit. Had to be one of them, right? Interesting choice.
string: 嗯。無畏的主婦兼母親，還有陰險狡詐的虎人。必定是其中的某一個，對嗎？真是有趣的選擇。

original: I'd like to armor my horse.
string: 我想為我的馬匹穿上裝甲

original: You're a High Elf! I... I never would have guessed it. So many of your recipes are clearly aimed at the commonfolk. It just seems...
string: 你是個高等精靈！我……我絕對猜不到的。因為你絕大多數的菜肴都偏向平民喜好。就是看起來……

original: I guess all that's left is to bestow the title. What were those words again?
string: 我想只剩下稱號賜予的事情了。那該說什麼來著？

original: However, since it wouldn't behoove me to make you disappear, I'd rather have you on my side as Thane of Riften.
string: 然而，要我就這樣把放你走也太可惜了，我倒希望你能成為裂谷城武衛，做我的左右手。

original: He ran away. Back home to Windhelm. Samuel told me he was trying to get some murderer people to come here and kill Grelod. Did he really do it?
string: 他逃走了。回到了風舵城的家中。薩穆埃爾告訴我他在試著把刺客請來，要他們殺死桂羅。他真的這麼幹了？

original: I can provide you with some help with her minions.
string: 如果屆時要對付她的爪牙什麼的，我可以提供一些幫助。

original: Aventus Aretino. He was sent to live here after his mother died. He escaped. And...
string: 阿文圖斯．艾瑞提諾，他在母親死後就被送到這裡來住。他逃走了，然後……

original: I expect that you'll distance yourself from the affairs of state. In other words, keep your nose out of my business and we'll do just fine.
string: 我希望你能劃清界限，不要插手本土的事務。換句話說，只要你不來干涉我，那大家都能相安無事。

original: Oh, Asgeir! My husband! My dear, sweet husband! Why would someone do this to you? Why? This was supposed to be the happiest day of my life!
string: 噢，艾斯蓋爾！我的丈夫！我親愛的，甜蜜的丈夫！為什麼會有人幹這種事？為什麼？今天應該是我一生中最開心的日子啊！

original: Constance don't care much for strangers in the orphanage. Afraid someone might hurt one of us kids. Which, I gotta admit, is kind of nice.
string: 康斯坦斯不太理會孤兒院裡的陌生人。她怕有人會傷害孩子們。我得承認，她這樣倒是挺好的。

original: Token, you say? Let me see.
Let's see what you can do with this. (<Global=InvestAmount> gold)
string: 讓我們來看看你能對此做些什麼？（投資<Global=InvestAmount>金幣）

original: Yes. I had Falk call you back because you were at the summoning, you have a connection to Potema now. You must deal with her.
string: 沒錯。我要佛克請你回來，是因為施法召喚時你也在場，現在你與波特瑪有了聯繫。必須由你來對付她

original: We can talk about that once this dragon is dealt with.
string: 等我們處理了這頭龍的問題再說吧。

original: I submit. Take me to jail.
You're a Nord! I never would have guessed it! But where in the world did you learn to cook like that? Here in Skyrim? Or maybe somewhere less...
string: 你是個諾德人！這可太難猜了！但是你在那裡學到了這麼好的烹飪技術？在這裡，天際省？或者其他的什麼地方？

original: Now, you are going to speak to this... Monk... and find out why he is here, and then he will be removed from College grounds.
string: 你等一下要跟這個……呃……修道士談談，找出他出現在這的原因。然後他很快就會被請出這裡。

original: Can you train me to better use Heavy Armor?
string: 你能教我更有效地運用重甲技能嗎？

original: Ah yes. I've studied those documents... Very interesting...
string: 啊，對了。我一直在研究那些文件……很有意思……

original: About that message from the Jarl...
string: 關於那個來自領主的口信……

original: Hmph. Yes. Yes, I surely can. It's not something I do lightly, mind you, and it's not as specific as you might want. But yes. I will do this for you.
string: 嗯。是的。是的，當然可以。但先說好，這不是什麼輕而易舉的事，也許沒你期待得那麼詳盡。但是可以，我能幫你。

original: For the moment, the Wolf Queen has retreated to a place filled with dead eager to serve her. She has gone to her old Catacombs.
string: 目前，狼女王已經退到一個滿是她忠實追隨者的地方 - 她那座古代地下墓穴。

original: Much like Mjoll, you've become champion of our hold; helping people with their difficulties and providing assistance for their needs.
string: 就像是穆月爾一樣，你現在成為了我們領地的勇士 ；不僅幫助人們解決了很多困難，還盡力滿足他們的需要。

original: I do hope mummy and father come to get me soon. Ever since that Aventus boy left, this place has gone mad.
string: 我非常希望父母快來接我回去。自從阿文圖斯離開後，這個地方就陷入瘋狂了。
關於那個來自烏弗瑞克的口信……

original: By all the gods, the groom has been killed. At his own wedding! I can only think of my own husband...
string: 天啊，新郎死了！在他自己的婚禮上！我想到我自己的丈夫……

original: Then allow me to officially welcome you to Riften. You'll make a fine addition to our city.
string: 那麼，請讓我正式地歡迎你來到裂谷城。你絕對會愛上我們這城市的。

original: I was apprenticed to Balimund before he died. He taught me everything I know about forging armor and weapons.
string: 巴利穆德死前我是他的學徒。他教會了我每一件有關打造兵器和護甲的事情。

original: Did he now? The man is persistent, I'll give him that.
string: 又是他？只能說，這傢伙太有毅力了。

original: You look young for a blacksmith.
string: 以一個鐵匠來說，你還真年輕啊。

original: Before he left, he said he was going to do the Black Sacrament. You know, to call the Dark Brotherhood. So they'd come and kill old Grelod!
string: 他離開之前，他說他要去做黑色聖禮。你知道，就是召喚黑暗兄弟會。這樣他們就會來殺死老桂羅。

original: I remember you, you were at Helgen. Speak to Legate Rikke. I suspect we could use someone like you.
string: 我記得你，事發時你在聖地鎮。跟瑞姬副官談談吧。我們需要你這種人。

original: My son is dead! At his own wedding! Only those Imperial dogs would have dared do something like this! Damn them all to Oblivion!
string: 我的兒子死了！在他自己的婚禮上！只有帝國的走狗敢做出這種事情！詛咒他們全部掉進湮滅中！

original: I would be honored to accept.
string: 能夠得到這個稱號讓我倍感榮幸。

original: You've already taken all the necessary steps in becoming eligible for the title.
string: 你完成了所有必要步驟，你已有足夠資格來獲得這個稱號。

original: That is the truth, my friend! Maven is a saint and don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
string: 這就是真相，朋友！瑪雯是個聖人，別聽別人說些有的沒的。

original: I need you to carry something...
I have slain <Alias=DeadFriend> to gain your favor.
string: 我為了博得你的好感殺死了<Alias=DeadFriend>。
告訴我關於瑪雯．黑棘的事。

original: She was responsible for the Empire's near collapse almost five hundred years ago. I believe I have a book about her...
string: 她是五百多年前讓帝國遭遇到危機的罪魁禍首。我有一本關於她的書。

original: My good pleasure is not some trophy for mortal sport!
string: 我怎麼可能為凡人的戰利品感到高興！

original: All that remains now is to bestow the title upon you.
string: 現在最後一步就是要把稱號賜予給你。

original: The timid warrior and the sly Khajiit. Must have been one or the other, right?
string: 老是怯場的戰士和狡滑的虎人。總有一個是對的，是吧？
盜賊公會商隊銷贓者任務

original: Thonar Silver-Blood has granted me a pardon for killing Madanach. My name has now been cleared in the Reach.
string: 托納爾．銀血因為我殺死了邁德納奇原諒了我，我在邊塞領是個清白人了。

original: Enthir agreed to return Onmund's amulet to him, and has given it to me. I need to make sure it gets back to Onmund.
string: 恩希爾同意把昂蒙德的護身符還給他了，並且把它交給了我。我需要把它交給昂蒙德。
找到墨瑟目前位置的證據
在霜齋外和維歐拉見面

original: <Alias=Brute> won't be causing as much trouble for <Alias=BruteTown>.

After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. I need to persuade the Jarl of Whiterun to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。我得知白漫領主的宮殿龍臨堡曾囚禁過一隻巨龍，我要去說服白漫領主幫助我在龍臨堡再抓一隻。
跟隨法卡斯到你的房間

original: I've met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine has punished by preventing his transformations. Hircine has asked me to finish the job and gain his favor by killing Sinding.
string: 我見到了辛丁，一個受到魔侯海爾辛懲罰而無法控制變形的狼人。海爾辛要我透過殺死辛丁來取悅他。

original: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun has told me to look for Sam in Morvunskar.
string: 我從一夜的放蕩中醒來，不知道發生了什麼事。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。白漫的伊索爾達叫我去莫萬斯卡找山姆。

original: The Companions leaders say they don't have any more work for me, but that I should speak to Skjor about "the next steps."
string: 戰友團領導人說他們不會再有工作給我了，但是我可以和斯科約爾談談關於「下一步」。

original: I've discovered an unusual golden decanter inside Honningbrew Meadery. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在蜜之釀酒莊內發現一尊不尋常的黃金玻璃瓶。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: I've discovered an curious Dwemer-constructed puzzle cube inside Calcelmo's Quarters in Markarth. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在馬卡斯城卡塞莫的房間內發現了一個奇怪的矮人魔方。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。
學會召喚傲達威英的龍吼
（選擇性）和「小煩」談談有關沃德的事

original: I should attend the funeral of Kodak Whitman, the late Harbinger of the Companions.
string: 我應該參加戰友團上一任先驅者克拉科．白鬃的葬禮。
地下城探險（領主 - 洞穴）
打敗並且困住傲達威英

original: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder. Jorleif, the steward, may have advice from time to time.
string: 風舵城為一個神秘的殺手困擾不已。我受託調查最近的這起謀殺案。喬雷福，城裡的總管，也許偶而會提供一些建議。

original: Give the final fragment to Eorlund
string: 把最後一塊碎片交給厄倫德

original: Find Esbern in the Ratway Warrens
string: 在鼠道窩棚找到伊思本

original: I have found the staff that Enthir wanted, and need to deliver it to him so that he'll exchange it for Onmund's amulet.
string: 我找到了恩希爾想要的法杖，我需要把法杖帶給他以換取昂蒙德的護身符。

original: <Alias=Brute> has been causing trouble for someone around <Alias=BruteTown>. I need to rough <Alias.PronounObj=Brute> up to remind <Alias.PronounObj=Brute> of <Alias.PronounPosObj=Brute> obligations.
string: <Alias=Brute>一直在<Alias=BruteTown>找某人的麻煩。我得教訓教訓<Alias.PronounObj=Brute>來提醒<Alias.PronounObj=Brute><Alias.PronounPosObj=Brute>職責所在。

original: Search for information about the dragons returning

I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ysolda in Whiterun will give me more information about Same once I return the ring I borrowed from her to give to a hagraven Witchmist Grove.
string: 我從一夜的放蕩中醒來，不知道發生了什麼事。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。白漫的伊索爾達稱如果我幫她把我之前從她那裡借來並送到女巫迷霧樹林的指環歸還的話，她就會給我更多的資訊。

original: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Now to find Alduin and defeat him once and for all.
string: 我穿過了奧杜因的傳送門，來到了英靈殿，這是艾瑟瑞斯位面。那些諾德英雄們靈魂，在最終審判前進行盛宴、戰鬥。我要找到奧杜因，並且一勞永逸地打敗牠。
拿到卡塞莫的伐莫族語翻譯指

original: Calcelmo's "notes" on the Falmer language are actually derived from a massive stone slab in his tower! It will be impossible to bring this item to Enthir to have him translate Gallus's Journal. I'll have to discover a way to make the information more portable.
string: 卡塞莫的伐莫族語「筆記」都記在他的高塔中的一大片石板上！我不可能把這個東西帶給恩希爾讓他幫我翻譯加盧斯的日記。我必須想辦法帶走這些資訊。

original: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard is looking for someone to look into the issue.
string: 龍橋鎮的代表出現在獨孤城的宮廷上請求幫助調查狼頭骨洞穴。佛可．火鬍正在找尋可以調查此事件的人。

original: Enthir insists that Onmund sold him the amulet in question, and he will not go back on a trade. If, however, I can recover a particular staff for Enthir, he'll give me the amulet. I'll need to search <Alias=StaffLocation> for the staff.
string: 恩希爾堅持昂蒙德賣給他的護身符有問題，他不會再拿來進行交易。不過，如果我可以幫他找回一根特殊的法杖的話，他就會把護身符給我。我需要搜索<Alias=StaffLocation>以找到這根法杖。

original: Mehrunes Dagon has promised to reforge his Razor if I place my hands on his altar.
string: 梅魯涅斯．大袞許諾如果我把手放在他的祭壇上的話，他將為我重鑄利刃。

original: Lead Saadia to the Whiterun Stables
string: 把薩蒂亞引到白漫城馬廄

original: Silus is dead and Mehrunes' Razor is mine.
string: 希魯斯死了，梅魯涅斯的利刃是我的了。

original: Become a full member of the Thieves Guild
string: 成為盜賊公會的正式成員
（選擇性）偷走哈爾嘉的蒂貝拉塑像

original: I rescued <Alias=Victim> from <Alias=Lair> and escorted <Alias.PronounObj=Victim> back to <Alias=VictimHome>.
Silus Vesuius, the owner of a museum dedicated to the Mythic Dawn cult, wants to hire me for a job. He'll give me the details inside his house in Dawnstar.
string: 希魯斯．維西歐斯，一個專門收藏破曉神教物品的博物館的館長，請我幫他完成一個任務。他會在晨星的住宅裡跟我說明詳情。

original: I helped grant Kodlak Whitemane the glory of Sovngarde, and took his place as Harbinger of the Companions.
string: 我幫助克拉科．白鬃獲得了進入英靈殿的榮譽，並接替他成為戰友團的先驅者。
與戴爾菲娜在馬廄碰面

original: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. She's going to help me infiltrate the Thalmor ambassador's manor and find out what they know about the dragons. I should meet with her contact, Malborn, in the Winking Skeever Inn in Solitude.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。她準備幫我滲透進入梭默大使官邸看看他們對龍知道些什麼？我要去獨孤城眨眼惡鼠旅館和她的聯絡人馬伯恩碰面。

original: A group of men calling themselves the Alik'r are looking for a Redguard woman in Whiterun.
string: 一群自稱為阿利克爾的人正在尋找白漫城中的一個紅衛女子。

original: Bring Gleda the Goat back to Ennis in Rorikstead
string: 將山羊格麗達帶回給洛利克鎮的埃尼斯

original: Potema has been summoned from beyond the grave. I've defeated her in the Catacombs and retrieved her bones. I must return them to Styrr for blessing and tell Falk Potema has been defeated.
string: 波特瑪已經從墳墓中被召喚出來了，正在聚集力量。我在墓穴裡打敗了她並且拿走了她的遺骨。我必須把它們帶給斯提爾以換取他的祝福，並且告訴佛可說波特瑪已經被打敗了。

original: I've discovered what appears to be a shipping map for the East Empire Company. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我發現了一張像是東帝國貿易公司海圖的東西。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: Silus Vesuius is offering me gold to retrieve the three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor from their current owners. Drascua has the pommel, Ghunzul has the blade shards, and Jorgen has the hilt.
string: 希魯斯．維西歐斯花錢請我去從三個人的手中獲取三塊梅魯涅斯的利刃碎片。德拉斯庫拉持有劍柄寶石，甘澤爾持有刀刃，而喬爾根則持有劍柄。

original: Find a way to enter the Alik'r hideout
string: 設法進入阿利克爾的藏身處

original: The Greybeards summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. Their leader, Arngeir, recognized me as "Dragonborn", and taught me more about my new Voice powers. After passing several tests, they sent me on one final trial, retrieving the legendary Horn of Jurgen Windcaller.
string: 灰鬍子把我召到了世界咽喉的高吼峰上的修道院。我和灰鬍子的領袖艾恩蓋爾談過了，他認為我是一個「龍裔」，並教給了我更多關於龍吼的知識。通過了幾項試鍊之後，他們派我進行最後一項試鍊，從埋葬約根．喚風的炙燃墓中取回他的號角。

original: The legendary warrior band of Whiterun, the Companions have agreed to let me join them, if I can handle some preliminary tasks for them.
string: 白漫城傳奇性的戰士組織「戰友團」同意我加入他們了，前提是要先通過他們的考驗。

original: Sabjorn has provided me with poison I'm to apply to the nests deep within the tunnels under Honningbrew Meadery. As Mallus predicted, I should be able to use the very same poison to taint Sabjorn's mead as well.
string: 撒布喬恩給了我毒藥，叫我放在蜜之釀酒莊下方管道深處的巢穴裡。而莫魯斯認為我也可以把這些毒藥拿去污染撒布喬恩的蜜酒。

original: I have awoken in the Temple Of Dibella in Markarth. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. I have no idea how I got here but a priestess has told me I trashed the Temple. The priestess might tell me what happened to Sam and the staff if I pick up the place.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。我不知道我是怎麼過來的，一個女祭司告訴我我把神殿搞得一團糟。這位女祭司也許可以告訴我山姆和法杖到底發生了什麼事。

original: Find out how to defeat Alduin

The leader of the so-called "assassins" I've been asked to eliminate claims that Saadia betrayed her people to the Dominion and they are here to bring her to justice. I've agreed to lead her into an ambush at the Whiterun stables.
string: 我受託要去消滅的所謂「刺客」的頭目聲稱薩蒂亞把她的同胞出賣給了先祖神洲，他們是來抓她去接受審判的。我同意引誘她到白漫城馬廄，他們埋伏在那等她。

original: Get Greybeards' help in negotiating a truce
string: 得到灰鬍子的幫助商議一個停戰協定
帶有指示的已死寶物獵人

original: Learn the Word of Power from Einarth
string: 從愛納斯那裡學習力量之語

original: Patrol the streets of the Stone Quarter at night
string: 入夜後巡邏石頭居住區

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. I've learned that Dragonsreach, the Jarl's palace in Whiterun, was once used to imprison a dragon. If I can arrange a truce in the civil war, the Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Then I can interrogate the dragon and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。我得知白漫領主的宮殿龍臨堡曾囚禁過一隻巨龍。如果我可以達成一個停戰協定結束內戰，白漫領主答應幫助我在龍臨堡捕獲一隻巨龍。我就可以審問牠從而獲悉奧杜因的巢穴，然後一勞永逸地解決牠了。

original: Speak to Silus inside his house
string: 和希魯斯在他屋子內交談
找出撒布喬恩的神秘合作人的身份

original: Return the Honningbrew Decanter to Delvin
string: 把蜜之釀酒莊玻璃瓶帶給戴爾文

original: Potema has been summoned from beyond the grave and is gathering power. Falk has sent me to Styrr to get the key to Potema's Catacombs.
string: 波特瑪已經從墳墓中被召喚出來了，正在聚集力量。佛可派我去找斯提爾拿波特瑪墓穴的鑰匙。

original: Take the Totem to the Underforge

Calcelmo has proven to be extremely stubborn and refuses to allow me access to his materials regarding the Falmer language. I'm left with little choice other than taking matters into my own hands and stealing his notes.
string: 卡塞莫非常頑固，拒絕讓我接觸任何他的有關伐莫族語的資料。我只能嘗試著用自己的辦法來解決。就是偷走他的筆記。
和波耶西亞的傳話人說話
演示你的「旋風衝刺」龍吼

original: Vex has revealed to me that the Crown of Barenziah is actually a paragon for the Thieves Guild. If I can recover the crown from Tolvald's Cave, she should be able to restore our paragon to its full strength.
string: 「小煩」告訴我說巴蘭茲雅王冠實際上是盜賊公會的聖物。如果我可以從托沃德洞穴找回王冠，她可以把聖物恢復到原來的力量。

original: Arniel has finally revealed to me that his secret project deals with the disappearance of the dwarves, though he hasn't been clear about how his work relates to it. He's given me a warped soul gem, and asked me to find several Dwarven Convectors in the various ruins around Skyrim. I'm supposed to place the gem inside a convector, and then heat it using a spell Arniel has taught me. When I've done this several times, I should return the gem to Arniel.
string: 阿內爾終於告訴我他的秘密計劃和矮人的失蹤有關，不過還是不清楚他的計劃和其中的關聯性在哪。他給了我一塊扭曲的靈魂石，請我在天際的廢墟中找幾個矮人環流器。我需要把石頭放在一個環流器裡，使用阿內爾教給我的法術加熱。這麼操作幾次之後，我就可以把石頭交還給阿內爾了。

original: Enthir has informed me that Gallus's Journal is written in Falmer. He's directed me to seek out Calcelmo, the Court Wizard in Markarth who is the foremost authority on them in hopes of obtaining a translation.
string: 恩希爾告訴我加盧斯的日記是用伐莫族語寫的。他叫我去找馬卡斯城的宮廷法師卡塞莫，他是這方面的權威，可以幫我翻譯。

original: Mehrunes Dagon has asked me to kill Silus Vesuius. I will be given the reforged Razor if I succeed.
string: 梅魯涅斯請我殺死希魯斯．維西歐斯。成功的話，我可以獲得利刃作為獎勵。

original: Return the Dwemer Puzzle Cube to Delvin
string: 把矮人魔方帶給戴爾文

original: If I want to become a member of the Companions, I have to speak to their leader, Kodlak Whitemane, in Whiterun.
string: 如果我想加入戰友團，我應該去和他們的領袖，白漫城的克拉科．白鬃談談。

original: After successfully locating the Ragged Flagon, Brynjolf has given me a new assignment. Three business owners in Riften are proving to be a thorn in his side and I'm supposed to teach them the error of their ways. I should speak to Brynjolf about these townspeople in the event that they prove to be as stubborn as I'm expecting them to be.
string: 成功獲悉漏壺的位置後，布林喬夫給了一項新任務。在裂谷城，有三個店主的所作所為使他們成了布林喬夫的眼中釘，而我應該設法讓他們明白自己的錯誤。要是他們太過冥頑不靈，我也得將情況回報給布林喬夫知道。

original: I've become a key component in a cunning plan to frame Honningbrew Meadery's owner, Sabjorn, and have him imprisoned. The first part of the scheme is to approach Sabjorn under the guise of assistance with a pest problem he's having thanks to Mallus's tinkering.
string: 計畫是栽贓蜜之釀酒莊的老闆撒布喬恩並把他關進監獄，而我是計畫的關鍵部分。計畫的第一部分是首先以幫助解決害蟲問題的藉口接近撒布喬恩，幫他搞定莫魯斯搗出的小亂子。

original: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.
string: 梭默和我們一樣困惑於龍的回歸。我得知他們在找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，戴爾菲娜說他是一個龍族知識的專家。我在裂谷城的鼠道裡找到了他，並且說服他讓我進門說明我的來歷。

original: Vilkas and I avenged Kodlak's death by bringing ruin to the Silver Hand.
string: 威爾卡斯和我摧毀了白銀之手，替克拉科報仇了。

original: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。在馬伯恩的幫助下，我滲透進入了大使官邸。我搜索了大使的辦公室，得知梭默跟我們一樣對龍的回歸一無所知——但是他們正在裂谷城找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，梭默認為他也許知曉龍族回歸的意義。

original: Maven Black-Briar has sent me to Whiterun where I am to meet with someone named Mallus Maccius. Together, our goal is to bring down one of Maven's competitors, Honningbrew Meadery and discover where he obtained the financing to take her on.
string: 瑪雯．黑棘派我去白漫見一個叫莫魯斯．馬修斯的人。我們的目的是一起扳倒瑪雯的一個競爭對手，蜜之釀酒莊，並且找出他資金的來源。

original: Ask about Sam and the staff in Rorikstead
string: 在洛利克鎮詢問山姆和法杖的事情

original: I'm on my way back to the Ragged Flagon to meet up with Karliah. Using the information obtained from Gallus's journal as proof, I hope to convince Brynjolf of Karliah's innocence and Mercer Frey's betrayal.
string: 我準備回漏壺與卡莉亞碰面。我打算拿從加盧斯的日記上獲取的資訊作為證據，向布林喬夫證明卡莉亞的清白，墨瑟．弗雷才是叛徒。

original: "Sam" turned out to be the daedric prince of debauchery, Sanguine. He spurred me on during a drunken night of revelry that crossed all of Skyrim. I've acquired the Sanguine Rose for my troubles.
string: 「山姆」居然是司掌放蕩之魔侯，桑吉恩。他在一個尋歡作樂的酒醉之夜慫恿我橫跨整個天際省大陸。他給了我血腥玫瑰作為獎勵。

original: Thieves stolen Finn's Lute from the Bards College over a year ago. Inge Six-Fingers has asked me to recover the lute from their stronghold.
string: 小偷在一年前把芬恩的魯特琴從吟遊詩人學院偷走了，因格．六指請求我從他們的據點中把琴取回來。

original: A representative from Dragon Bridge has appealed to the court in Solitude for help investigating Wolfskull Cave. Falk Firebeard has asked me to clear out the cave.
string: 龍橋鎮的代表出現在獨孤城的宮廷上請求幫助調查狼頭骨洞穴。佛可．火鬍請我去清理洞穴。

original: Meet Karliah at the Ragged Flagon
<Alias=Brute> was killed, through no fault of my own.

string: 將精靈屠戮者歸還到伊斯格拉謨雕像手中

original: Brynjolf is convinced Mercer Frey intends to perform one final heist before departing Skyrim for good. According to the plans I discovered in Riftweald Manor, he's after the "Eyes of the Falmer," two gems of enormous value. If we have any hopes of intercepting Mercer, we need to proceed to their location immediately.
string: 布林喬夫相信墨瑟．弗雷在離開天際省之前打算犯下最後一筆案子。根據我在裂谷曠野莊園找到的計畫書，他正在尋找「伐莫族之眼」，那是兩顆無價的寶石。如果我們還想攔截墨瑟的話，我們必須立刻前往它們的所在地。

original: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. Arngeir has agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. I need to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
string: 白漫領主在內戰仍在進行的情況下不同意幫我抓捕巨龍。艾恩蓋爾同意在高吼峰上主持一個和平會議。我需要勸說帝國和風暴斗篷雙方達成停戰協定，去對付奧杜因這個雙方共同的敵人。

original: Talk to the Jarl of Whiterun

string: 進入阿利克爾的藏身處

original: Place the warped soul gem into a Convector
string: 把扭曲的靈魂之石放入環流器

original: I have been inducted as a full member of the Companions.

I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. A note of debt I gave to Ennis in Rorikstead has directed me to Ysolda in Whiterun, she might be able to direct me to Sam.
string: 我從一夜的放蕩中醒來，不知道發生了什麼事。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。洛利克鎮的埃尼斯要我去找白漫的伊索爾達，她也許能指引我找到山姆。

original: The Greybeards summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. I spoke to Arngeir, one of the Greybeards, who believes that I am "Dragonborn", which means I am especially gifted in the use of the Voice. They have offered to help me learn to use my new abilities.
string: 灰鬍子把我召到了世界咽喉的高吼峰上的修道院。我和灰鬍子艾恩蓋爾談過了，他認為我是一個「龍裔」，擁有掌握龍吼的特殊能力。他們準備幫我取得我的新能力。

original: I've once again helped Arniel with his secret, and very vague, project relating to the dwarves. He implied that he's waiting for something else, and then finally maybe I'll see what this is all about.
string: 我再次幫助阿內爾進行了他那和矮人相關的神秘計劃。他透露他正在等待著什麼，也許我最終可以瞭解一切背後的真相。

original: Inform the Alik'r of Saadia's location
string: 告訴阿利克爾有關薩蒂亞的下落

original: I've discovered the bust of a man named the Gray Fox inside Mercer Frey's House. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在墨瑟．弗雷的房間內發現了一個名叫灰狐的半身像。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. The Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Then I can interrogate the dragon and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。白漫領主答應幫助我在龍臨堡捕獲一隻巨龍。我就可以審問牠從而獲悉奧杜因的巢穴，然後一勞永逸地解決牠了。

original: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. With the help of her contact, Malborn, I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. I've now learned that the Thalmor are just as in the dark as we are - in fact, they're searching Riften for a Blade named Esbern, who they believe knows what the return of the dragons means.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。在馬伯恩的幫助下，我滲透進入了大使官邸。我搜索了大使的辦公室，得知梭默跟我們一樣對龍的回歸一無所知——但是他們正在裂谷城找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，梭默認為他也許知曉龍族回歸的意義。

original: It was suggested that I show my Unusual Gem to Vex, a member of the Thieves Guild in Riften. However, I'll need to wait until I'm full member of the Guild before she'll be able to assist me.
string: 我把我的不尋常的寶石給「小煩」看了看，她是裂谷城盜賊公會的成員。然而，我得等到我成為正式公會成員之後，她才可以給我提供協助。

original: Aela and I retrieved a Totem of Hircine from <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: 艾拉和我從<Alias=Dungeon>成功奪回了一個海爾辛圖騰。

original: <Alias=Victim> has been kidnapped and taken to <Alias=Lair>. I need to get <Alias.PronounObj=Victim> back to <Alias=VictimHome>.
string: <Alias=Victim>被綁架並帶到了<Alias=Lair>。我需要把<Alias.PronounObj=Victim>送回<Alias=VictimHome>。

original: Find the wedding ring in Witchmist Grove
string: 在女巫迷霧森林找到婚戒

original: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ennis in Rorikstead will tell me more about what happened once I return the goat I stole from him.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。只要我把我偷走的山羊還給洛利克鎮的埃尼斯，他就會告訴我發生了什麼事。
路易士．萊特魯什對惡棍

original: I have defeated Potema and been rewarded by Falk Firebeard.
string: 我打敗了波特瑪並且得到了佛可．火鬍的獎賞。

original: I have killed Silus Vesuius for Mehrunes Dagon. I should speak to the Lord of Destruction through his altar.
string: 我為梅魯涅斯．大袞殺死了希魯斯．維西歐斯。我應該通過祭壇和毀滅之王交談
將傲達威英召喚到龍臨堡

original: I met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine had punished by preventing his transformations. I helped kill him as a service to Hircine, and have been rewarded with the Savior's Hide.
string: 我見到了辛丁，一個受到魔侯海爾辛懲罰而無法控制變形的狼人。我幫助海爾辛殺死了他，並且拿到了救世主的庇護。

original: Guide Meridia's Light through the temple
string: 跟隨梅瑞狄雅之光穿過神殿

original: Deliver the soul gem to Arniel
Search the Ratway for Esbern's hideout
string: 搜尋鼠道以便找到伊思本的隱身所

original: Vilkas has come with me to avenge the death of Kodlak by wiping out the Silver Hand.
string: 威爾卡斯和我準備透過徹底摧毀白銀之手替克拉科報仇。

original: Place the warped soul gem into another Convector
string: 在另一個環流器中放入扭曲的靈魂之石

original: Go to Ysgramor's Tomb with the Circle
string: 和圓環成員一同前往伊斯格拉謨之墓

original: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I found Esbern hiding in the Ratway in Riften, and convinced him to let me in to explain myself.
string: 梭默和我們一樣困惑於龍的回歸。我得知他們在找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，戴爾菲娜說他是一個龍族知識的專家。我在裂谷城的鼠道裡找到了他，並且說服他讓我進門說明我的來歷。

original: I refused to kill Silus for Mehrunes Dagon. The Razor is forever out of my grasp.
string: 我拒絕為梅魯涅斯．大袞殺死希魯斯。利刃永遠地從我手邊溜走了。

original: I've helped Saadia escape the clutches of the Alik'r sent after her. With their leader defeated, she believes the rest of them will scatter, affording her some much-needed safety for now.
string: 我幫助薩蒂亞逃離了那群阿利克爾追殺者。打敗了刺客的頭目後，她認為剩下的刺客便會作鳥獸散，她暫時可以安全一點了。

original: I've met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine has punished by preventing his transformations. I'm going to defend him against the hunters that Hircine has sent to end his life.
string: 我見到了辛丁，一個受到魔侯海爾辛懲罰而無法控制變形的狼人。我需要保護他免遭海爾辛派來的獵人獵殺。

original: Create a distraction and get away from the party
string: 製造一場混亂然後離開宴會

original: Lead someone to become trapped by the shrine and slay them
string: 把某個人騙到祭壇來並殺死他

original: Eorlund needs the fragments of Wuuthrad to prepare them for remounting in Jorrvaskr.
string: 厄倫德需要精靈屠戮者的碎片，以便把它們重新放在勇士之家中。
和維歐拉一起調查霜齋

original: An otherworldly voice coming from Mount Kilkreath is commanding me to find a beacon and return it.
string: 在基爾克瑞斯山脈，一個來自另一個世界的聲音命令我去找到並帶回一個信標。
演示你的「冷酷之力」龍吼
（選擇性）砸毀波西珍貴的矮人骨灰甕
把榮恩的鼓交給吉勞德

original: <Alias=Questgiver> says that the Companions have been waiting for my return. I'm supposed to follow <Alias.PronounObj=Questgiver>.
string: <Alias=Questgiver> 說戰友團在等著我的回歸。我應該跟著<Alias.PronounObj=Questgiver>。

original: Talk to the heroes of Sovngarde
string: 和英靈殿的英雄們交談

original: I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls. My only hope is to reach the Hall of Heroes.
string: 我穿過了奧杜因的傳送門，來到了英靈殿，這是艾瑟瑞斯位面。那些諾德英雄們靈魂，在最終審判前進行盛宴、戰鬥。奧杜因設下了靈魂陷阱，是一股濃厚迷霧供牠躲藏在其中獵食靈魂同時又籠蓋英靈殿峽谷的去路。我要做的就是想辦法到達英雄大殿。

original: Inform the Alik'r of Saadia's location
string: 告訴阿利克爾有關薩蒂亞的下落

original: I've recovered one of the Eyes of the Falmer from Irkngthand. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在自苦悶之牙廢墟裡找到了伐莫族之眼。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: Onmund has asked me to help him get an amulet with sentimental value back from Enthir.
string: 昂蒙德請我幫他從恩希爾那裡拿回一個對他來說有重大意義的護身符。

original: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. She's going to talk to her contacts about how we can infiltrate the Thalmor Embassy.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。她準備和她的聯絡人聯繫讓我們滲透進梭默大使館。

original: Retrieve and equip the Ebony Mail
string: 取得並裝備黑檀岩鏈甲

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. With the help of the Jarl of Whiterun, I've trapped the dragon Odahviing in Dragonsreach. Now to interrogate Odahviing and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。在白漫領主的幫助下，我在龍臨堡捕獲了巨龍傲達威英。現在可以審問牠關於奧杜因巢穴的地點然後一勞永逸地解決奧杜因。

original: There are stories in Falkreath of a strange vagrant who savagely killed a little girl.
string: 佛克瑞斯領有傳言說一個奇怪的流浪者殘忍地殺死了一個女孩。

original: Return the wedding ring to Ysolda in Whiterun
string: 將婚戒還給白漫的伊索爾達

original: Retrieve the pommel of Mehrunes' Razor
string: 取回梅魯涅斯利刃的劍柄寶石

original: Learn the Word of Power from Borri
string: 從博瑞那裡學習力量之語
和奎因圖斯．那瓦勒交談

original: Return the Queen Bee Statue to Delvin
string: 把蜂后雕像帶給戴爾文

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. The Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. Now I need some way to lure a dragon into the trap. Esbern or Paarthurnax might be able to help.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。白漫領主答應幫我在龍臨堡捕獲一隻龍，我現在只需要引一隻龍進入我的陷阱。伊思本和帕圖納克斯也許能幫上忙。

original: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial.
string: 努瑞萊昂的助手，奎因圖斯相信他找到了一種方法可以修復雪瓶。

original: Return the book to Urag gro-Shub
string: 把書帶給烏拉格．格洛-舒布

original: The Companions have given me one final challenge before inducting me. I'm to retrieve a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, from <Alias=Dungeon> while <Alias=Observer> judges my valor.
string: 戰友團給了我正式入會前的最後一項挑戰。我要去<Alias=Dungeon>收回伊斯格拉謨的傳奇巨斧——精靈屠戮者的碎片，並且在途中讓<Alias=Observer>評估我的勇氣。

original: Meet Silus at the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon
string: 在梅魯涅斯．大袞祭壇和希魯斯碰面

original: I have discovered a shrine to Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.
string: 我在風舵城附近的山裡發現了波耶西亞祭壇。

original: Return the Ship Model to Delvin
string: 把船隻模型帶給戴爾文

original: Onmund is grateful that I was able to deal with Enthir and return his amulet.
string: 昂蒙德很感激我幫他應付恩希爾並拿到了護身符。

original: The Companions believe there is a way to cleanse Kodlak's soul of the taint of the beast. We're going to the ancient Tomb of Ysgramor to perform the ceremony.
string: 戰友團認為有辦法清洗克拉科靈魂深處的野獸污染。我們準備去伊斯格拉謨之墓舉行儀式。

original: Bring a Dragon Scale and a Dragon Bone to Esbern
string: 把一份龍鱗和一份龍骨帶給伊思本

original: Place the warpred soul gem into a final Convector
string: 在最後的環流器中放入扭曲的靈魂之石

original: The plan worked perfectly and Whiterun's Captain of the Guard was stricken with illness when he drank the poisoned mead. Sabjorn's been carted off to jail and Honningbrew Meadery is now closed.
string: 計劃進行得很完美，白漫的衛兵隊長喝了酒之後感到十分不舒服。撒布喬恩被關到監獄裡，蜜之釀酒莊也被迫關閉。

original: Karliah believes the only proof that could expose Mercer's treachery can be found within the pages of Gallus's journal which she recovered from Snow Veil Sanctum. Unfortunately, the journal is written in some sort of code that needs to be deciphered. Our only hope is Enthir, one of Karliah and Gallus's former acquaintances who is a wizard at the College of Winterhold.
string: 卡莉亞相信我們可以從雪幔聖所發現的加盧斯的日記中找到可以揭發墨瑟背叛的證據。不幸的是，日記是用密碼寫的，需要解碼。唯一的希望落在了卡莉亞和加盧斯的老朋友，冬堡學院的法師恩希爾身上。

original: As a member of the Circle, I need to convene in the Underforge to determine the next steps for the Companions following the death of Kodak Whitman.
string: 身為圓環的一員，我必須出席在地下熔爐中召開的會議，為克拉科．白鬃死後戰友團的下一步打算。

original: Bring the blade shards to Silus
string: 把刀刃碎片帶給希魯斯
與烏弗瑞克．風暴斗篷交談

original: Return the Eye of the Falmer to Delvin
string: 把伐莫族之眼帶給戴爾文

original: I have joined the Companions, the legendary warrior band of Whiterun.
string: 我加入了戰友團，白漫城的傳奇戰士團體。
和波耶西亞的傳話人說話

original: Apologize to the priestesses of Dibella
I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. The priestesses of Dibella have told me to ask about Sam in Rorikstead.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。蒂貝拉的女祭司叫我去洛利克鎮打聽山姆的事情。

original: Dark Brotherhood Assassin Sent to Kill the Player
string: 黑暗兄弟會刺客被派遣來刺殺玩家

original: Windhelm is plagued by a shadowy killer. I've been asked to help investigate the latest murder.
string: 風舵城為一個神秘的殺手困擾不已。我受託調查最近的這起謀殺案。

original: Ask Falk Firebeard about Wolfskull Cave
string: 詢問佛可．火鬍關於狼頭骨洞穴的事

original: I've successfully altered Arniel's warped soul gem, and should return it to him. It is somehow critical to his project regarding the disappearance of the dwarves; perhaps he'll explain exactly what he's up to.
string: 我成功地幫阿內爾轉化了扭曲的靈魂之石，應該把東西帶還給他了。他的計劃據稱和矮人的失蹤有關，這次他或許會說明清楚他的計劃。

original: I helped repair the White Phial in time for Nurelion to see it before he died.
string: 我成功修復了雪瓶以便讓努瑞萊昂死前看了它最後一眼。

original: It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. I met with her contact, Malborn, who is going to smuggle some of my equipment into the Thalmor ambassador's manor. I'm going to infiltrate the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. Once inside, I need to meet up with Malborn and figure out a way to slip away from the party without being caught.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。我見到了她的聯絡人馬伯恩，他可以把我的裝備偷運進大使官邸。我將會裝成大使的客人參加宴會。在裡面我和馬伯恩再想溜出來的辦法。

original: Retrieve the hilt of Mehrunes' Razor
string: 取回梅魯涅斯利刃的劍柄

original: Kill the bandit leader located at <Alias=BountyLocation>

I've passed through Alduin's portal into Sovngarde, the realm of Aetherius where the souls of Nord heroes go to feast and battle until the final reckoning. Alduin has laid some kind of soul-snare across the valley of Sovngarde, a mist where he hides and feeds upon the trapped souls.
