I reached the Hall of Heroes and met Gormlaith Golden-Hilt, Hakon One-Eye, and Felldir the Old - the three heroes who I saw defeat Alduin in my vision of the past. They have been permitted by Shor, the god of the underworld, to join me in my battle against Alduin.
string: 我穿過了奧杜因的傳送門來到了英靈殿，這是艾瑟瑞斯位面。那些諾德英雄們的靈魂，在最終審判前進行盛宴、戰鬥。奧杜因設定了靈魂陷阱擋住了英靈殿峽谷，這種靠靈魂餵養的迷霧隱藏了他。我到達了英雄大殿。遇到了葛拉斯．金刀鞘，獨眼哈孔和老人費迪爾，他們就是在我有關過去的影像中，出現並曾打敗過奧杜因的英雄。他們得到了朔爾，陰間之神的准許，和我一起去打敗奧杜因。

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. I need to locate his lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，他逃走了。我需要找到牠的巢穴然後一勞永逸地解決牠。

original: I've brought the Crown of Barenziah back to Vex, who has restored it to its original condition where it now serves as a paragon for the Thieves Guild.
string: 我把巴蘭茲雅王冠帶給了「小煩」，她幫我恢復了原來的狀態，現在它繼續作為聖物被盜賊公會供奉著。

original: I've met Sinding, a werewolf who the Daedric Lord Hircine has punished by preventing his transformations. He's given me the ring he stole and asked me to entreat Hircine for forgiveness.
string: 我見到了辛丁，一個受到魔侯海爾辛懲罰而無法控制變形的狼人。他給了我偷走的指環，並且請我替他請求海爾辛的原諒。

original: I have proven myself to Boethiah, and she has made me her new champion.
string: 我向波耶西亞證明瞭自己，她讓我成了她的新的勇士。

original: I have confronted and stopped a group of necromancers attempting to summon Potema, the Wolf Queen, in Wolfskull Cave. I should return to Falk Firebeard with the news.
string: 在狼頭骨洞穴中我遭遇並且阻止了一群試圖召喚波特瑪——狼女王的死靈術士。我應該帶著消息回去找佛可．火鬍。

original: Brynjolf has promised me more work if I'm able to locate him at a tavern called the Ragged Flagon. Judging from the dangerous nature of its location, it seems as though he's having me perform some type of initiation, but I can't be certain.
string: 布林喬夫承諾如果我能去一個叫做漏壺的酒館找到他的話，他就給我更多的任務。從這個地方的危險程度看來，看起來他像是在讓我進行一個準備儀式，不過我並不確定。

original: I have awoken in the Temple Of Dibella in Markarth. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。

original: I've found a strange gem. An otherworldly voice is commanding me to bring it to Mount Kilkreath.
string: 我找到了一塊奇怪的石頭，一個來自另一個世界的聲音命令我帶它回到基爾克瑞斯山脈。

original: Now that Mallus's position as the owner of Honningbrew Meadery has been secured, I need to find any information explaining how Sabjorn was able to fund this costly operation.
string: 現在莫魯斯在蜜之釀酒莊的地位已經得到了鞏固，我需要找到任何可以解釋撒布喬恩資金來源的資訊。
與馬伯恩在獨孤城碰面
把威爾卡斯的劍交給厄倫德

original: I've been sent to speak to Maven Black-Briar, head of the wealthiest most influential family in Riften. According to Brynjolf, she has a job of utmost importance for me and I need to follow her directions to the letter.
string: 我被派去找瑪雯．黑棘談談，他是裂谷城最具影響力的家族的首領。根據布林喬夫的說法，她有重要的工作要交給我去做，我需要按照她的指示行事。

original: (Optional) Shoot the mechanism to lower the ramp
The hunt is on and I'm on my way to Riftweald Manor, Mercer Frey's estate in Riften, to locate a clue as to his current whereabouts.
string: 追捕還在繼續，我來到了裂谷曠野莊園，墨瑟．弗雷位於裂谷城的領地，以找到他目前藏身之地的線索。

original: Kill Kematu OR Convince Saadia to meet Kematu
string: 殺死凱馬圖或者勸說薩蒂亞與凱馬圖碰面

original: I've discovered an unusual statue of a queen bee within Goldenglow Estate. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在金色光輝莊園內發現一尊不尋常的蜂后雕像。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: The Greybeards have summoned me to their monastery of High Hrothgar on the slopes of the Throat of the World. They seem to have learned of the mysterious power that I gained when I killed the dragon outside Whiterun.
string: 灰鬍子召喚我去他們在世界咽喉山巔的高吼峰修道院。他們似乎得知我在白漫城外殺死巨龍後獲得了神秘力量。
把芬恩的魯特琴交給因格

original: Silus Vesuius now has all three pieces of Mehrunes' Razor and wants me to help him reforge it at the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.
string: 希魯斯．維西歐斯擁有了三塊梅魯涅斯的利刃碎片，他希望我能幫他在梅魯涅斯．大袞的祭壇重鑄它。

original: Duplicate the writing on Calcelmo's Stone
string: 複製卡塞莫的石板上的文字

original: After Enthir successfully translated Gallus's journal, I've discovered that Mercer's  motivations transcended simple greed or murder. As a member of the Nightingales, Mercer was tasked with guarding a place called The Twilight Sepulcher, the Temple of Nocturnal. According to Gallus, he defiled the temple and betrayed the Thieves Guild. Karliah insists we bring this information to Brynjolf immediately.
string: 在恩希爾成功地翻譯了加盧斯的日記之後，我發現墨瑟的動機不僅僅是出於貪婪而已。作為夜鶯的前成員，墨瑟負責守護黃昏墳墓，諾克圖娜爾的神殿。根據加盧斯的說法，他褻瀆了這個神殿，背叛了盜賊公會。卡莉亞堅持我們應該立刻把消息帶給布林喬夫

original: Locate Brynjolf at the Ragged Flagon
(Optional) Use Talen-Jei to get to Keerava
string: （選擇性）用塔倫-傑威脅基拉瓦

original: Bring Meridia's beacon to Mount Kilkreath
string: 把梅瑞狄雅的信標帶回基爾克瑞斯山脈

original: Gain admittance to the Hall of Valor
string: 獲得進入勇士大廳的許可
盜賊公會銷贓者處理者

original: The unusual gem has turned out to be one of twenty-four "Stones of Barenziah." According to Vex, they have little value unless the set is complete.
string: 這塊不尋常的寶石似乎是二十四塊「巴蘭茲雅寶石」中的一塊。根據小煩所說，除非集齊，否則它們沒什麼價值。

original: Search Morvunskar for Sam and the Staff
string: 在莫萬斯卡搜索山姆和法杖

original: I've dealt with the three troublesome business owners in Riften as Brynjolf had specified. Perhaps now that I've proven my worth to Brynjolf, I can discover more about this mysterious organization that he represents.
string: 我解決了裂谷城裡布林喬夫指定的三個生意人。也許我已經證明了我的價值，我可以知道更多關於他所代表的神秘組織資訊。

original: I have awoken in the Temple Of Dibella in Markarth. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. I have no idea how I got here but a priestess has told me I trashed the Temple. I have cleaned up the Temple, if I apologize to the priestess she might tell me what happened to Sam and the staff.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。我不知道我是怎麼過來的，一個女祭司說我把神殿搞得一團糟。首先我得打掃神殿，然後再向女祭司道歉，之後她也許會告訴我山姆和法杖都怎麼了。
奪回精靈屠戮者的碎片

original: There is an escaped criminal wandering <Alias=LocationHold>. I'm supposed to track <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal> down and kill <Alias.PronounObj=Criminal>.
string: 有一名逃犯在<Alias=LocationHold>附近閒逛。我應該找到<Alias.PronounObj=Criminal>並且殺死<Alias.PronounObj=Criminal>。

original: I have awoken from a night of debauchery with no idea what happened. Sam and the staff he promised me have disappeared. Ennis in Rorikstead will tell me more about what happened once I return the goat I stole from him.
string: 我在馬卡斯城的蒂貝拉神殿醒來。山姆和他答應給我的法杖都消失了。只要我把我偷走的山羊還給洛利克鎮的埃尼斯，他就會告訴我發生了什麼事。

original: The information I obtained from Honningbrew Meadery points to the same anonymous buyer of Goldenglow Estate. If successful, this individual would have completely estranged Maven Black-Briar from the Guild and destroyed it economically. It's becoming painfully obvious that it's time to shed some light on our mysterious adversary before they have a chance to strike again.
string: 我從蜜之釀酒莊獲得的消息指向了金色光輝莊園的一個匿名買家。如果成功的話，這個人甚至可以把瑪雯．黑棘和公會徹底隔絕開來，並且摧毀公會的經濟來源。看來我們必須要先找出這個神秘敵人的真實身份，再進行下一次行動。

original: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who is supposed to be an expert on ancient dragon lore. I've learned that he's hiding out in the Ratway Warrens in Riften.
string: 梭默和我們一樣困惑於龍的回歸。我得知他們在找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，戴爾菲娜說他是一個龍族知識的專家。我得知他躲在裂谷城的鼠道窩棚裡。

original: Brynjolf has been convinced of Karliah's innocence and Mercer's betrayal after investigating the Guild's treasure vault and finding it empty. Of greater mystery is the fact that the vault can only be opened with two keys and is utterly impervious to lockpicking. How Mercer Frey could have breached it is a mystery to us all.
string: 在調查公會的寶物庫發現裡面空空如也之後，布林喬夫才相信卡莉亞是清白的，墨瑟才是那個叛徒。不過神奇的是，寶物庫必須要用兩把鑰匙打開，而且是不可能被撬開的。墨瑟．弗雷到底是怎麼進去的還是個謎。

original: Follow up on the clues from Hjerim
I have helped Madanach escape Cidhna Mine, and he and his Forsworn have taken credit for all my past crime, clearing my name in the Reach.
string: 我幫助邁德納奇逃離了希訥礦坑，他和他的棄誓者答應幫我洗清罪名，我在邊塞已經是清白的了。

original: I successfully retrieved a fragment of Wuuthrad, the Blade of Ysgramor, to earn my place in the Companions.
string: 我成功取回了伊斯格拉謨的傳奇大斧——精靈屠戮者的一塊碎片，贏得了我在戰友團的一席之地。

original: Receive a reading from Olava the Feeble
string: 從「軟腳蝦」奧拉瓦那裡獲得預知

original: The Jarl of Whiterun wouldn't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war was raging. Arngeir agreed to host a peace council at High Hrothgar. With Esbern's help, I persuaded General Tullius and Ulfric Stormcloak to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
string: 白漫領主在內戰仍在進行的情況下不同意幫我抓捕巨龍。艾恩蓋爾同意在高吼峰上主持一個和平會議。在伊思本的幫助下，我成功勸說圖留斯將軍和烏弗瑞克．風暴斗篷達成停戰協定，去對付奧杜因這個雙方共同的敵人。

original: The barmaid at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun is apparently a fugitive noble from Hammerfell. She claims that she is on the run from assassins sent by rival houses in her homeland and needs someone to stop them before they find her.
string: 白漫城敕旗母馬客棧的女酒保看來是個來自落錘省的落難貴族。她聲稱在躲避家鄉敵對家族派來的刺客，想找人在這些刺客找到她之前阻止他們。

original: I have entered Kilkreath Ruins, destroyed Malkoran, and retrieved the artifact Dawnstar, which Meridia has bestowed upon me for my service.
string: 我進入了基爾克瑞斯遺址，消滅了莫克然，取得了神器破曉者，梅瑞狄雅將其贈與我作為酬勞。

original: The Jarl of Whiterun won't help me capture a dragon as long as the civil war is raging. If I can get the Greybeards to host a peace council, I can try to convince the Imperials and the Stormcloaks to agree to a truce in order to defeat Alduin, who is a threat to both sides in the civil war.
string: 白漫領主在內戰仍在進行的情況下不同意幫我抓捕巨龍。如果我可以讓灰鬍子主持一個和平會議，我就可以讓帝國和風暴斗篷達成停戰協定，去對付奧杜因這個雙方共同的敵人。

original: Potema has been summoned from beyond the grave and is gathering power. Styrr has given me the key to Potema's Catacombs. I must enter the catacombs and prevent Potema from fully resurrecting by acquiring her bones.
string: 波特瑪已經從墳墓中被召喚出來了，正在聚集力量。斯提爾把波特瑪墓穴的鑰匙給了我。我必須進入墓穴拿走她的遺骨，阻止波特瑪完全恢復力量。

original: I'm on my way to meet Mercer Frey at the ruins of Snow Veil Sanctum, Karliah's last known location. Together, Mercer and I intend to hunt her down and make her pay for Gallus's murder.
string: 我準備前往雪幔聖所的廢墟去見墨瑟．弗雷，那裡是我們所知卡莉亞最後一次出現的地方。我和墨瑟打算一起找到她，讓她為加盧斯的死付出代價。

original: I'm imprisoned inside Cidhna Mine, framed for Eltrys' murder. I have to find Madanach, the King in Rags, and clear my name.
string: 我被監禁在希訥礦坑，被誣陷為殺死艾翠斯的兇手，我必須找到邁德納奇，襤褸國王，然後洗清我的罪名。

original: Speak to Arngeir for further training
string: 與艾恩蓋爾談談關於進一步的訓練

original: I've found an unusual gem which seems to exhibit magical properties. I should bring it to Vex at the Thieves Guild for an appraisal.
string: 我找到了一個看起來不尋常的寶石。我應該把它帶到盜賊公會的「小煩」鑒定。

original: Meet Mercer Frey outside Snow Veil Sanctum
string: 在雪幔聖所外與墨瑟．弗雷見面

original: Return the East Empire Shipping Map to Delvin
string: 把東帝國海圖帶給戴爾文

original: Talk to Ysolda in Whiterun about the staff
string: 和白漫的伊索爾達談談關於法杖的事情

original: Giraud Gemane of the Bards College has found a clue to the location of the legendary drum of Rjorn. He's asked me to go to Halldir's Cairn and retrieve it.
string: 吟遊詩人學院的吉勞德．格瑪尼找到關於榮恩的傳奇之鼓的線索。他請求我到霍迪爾石塚把它找回來。

original: I killed an escaped criminal in <Alias=LocationHold>.

The tables have unexpectedly turned, and Mercer Frey has been revealed as Gallus's killer. I now find myself in Karliah's care after Mercer tried to murder me, claiming I'd outlasted my usefulness by witnessing their conversation. I've also discovered that Mercer, Gallus and Karliah were members of some sort of group calling themselves "The Nightingales" - guardians in service to the goddess Nocturnal. What they're protecting or what this has to do with the Guild is still a mystery to me.
string: 情況有了巨大的轉變，墨瑟．弗雷似乎才是殺死加盧斯的兇手。在發現墨瑟準備殺死我之後，我發現我根本是被卡莉亞算計了，因為只有我聽到了他們之間的對話我才能為卡莉亞作證。我發現墨瑟、加盧斯和卡莉亞都是一個叫做「夜鶯」的組織的前成員，他們為諾克圖娜爾女神服務。他們保護的目標以及與公會的關係對我來說還是個謎。

original: Silus is dead. Whatever plans he had have died with him.
string: 希魯斯死了，他的計劃和他一同長眠了。
回去找奎因圖斯．那瓦勒
詢問囚犯們關於邁德納奇的事情

original: Help clean up the Temple of Dibella

It seems that things are worse than even Delphine thought. Dragons aren't just coming back to life, they're being resurrected by other dragons. Delphine suspects that the Thalmor might be bringing dragons back for some sinister purpose. Her contact, Malborn, smuggled some of my equipment into the Thalmor ambassador's manor. I infiltrated the manor posing as a guest at the ambassador's party. Now I need to search the ambassador's office to find out what the Thalmor know about the dragons.
string: 事情比戴爾菲娜想的要嚴重。龍族不僅是回歸了，而且還在不斷的被其他龍復活著。戴爾菲娜懷疑這是梭默為某些陰險的目的而選擇把龍族帶回世間的。我見到了她的聯絡人馬伯恩，他把我的裝備偷運進大使官邸。我裝成大使的客人參加宴會。現在我要搜索大使的辦公室看看有沒有什麼有關龍族的資訊。

original: Kill Kematu or talk to him
string: 殺死凱馬圖或者和他談談

original: Give the fragments of Wuuthrad to Eorlund
string: 把精靈屠戮者的碎片交給厄倫德
將波特瑪殘骸交給斯提爾

original: Bring the pommel stone to Silus
string: 把劍柄寶石帶給希魯斯
與戴爾菲娜在河木鎮碰面

original: Meridia has commanded me to enter Kilkreath Ruins, destroy Malkoran, and retrieve the artifact Dawnbreaker. I will need to guide a beam of light through the ruins which will open the way for me.
string: 梅瑞狄雅命令我進入基爾克瑞斯遺址，消滅莫克然，取得神器「破曉者」。我需要指引一道光穿過遺跡，以便為我打開前路。

original: (Optional) Obtain the key to Calcelmo's Museum
string: （選擇性）拿到卡塞莫博物館的鑰匙

original: Nurelion's assistant, Quintus, believes he's found a way to repair the White Phial, and has enlisted me to track down some materials for him.
string: 努瑞萊昂的助手，奎因圖斯相信他找到了一種方法可以修復雪瓶。他要我幫他找一些材料。
和阿利克爾的囚犯交談

original: I've discovered the intricately crafted model of a sailing ship inside Snow Veil Sanctum. I should take it to Delvin Mallory at the Ragged Flagon to determine its true value.
string: 我在雪幔聖所內發現了一個做工精巧的船隻模型。我該把它帶給漏壺的戴爾文．馬洛里看看它的價值。

original: I found a book that mentioned a cult of Boethiah in the mountains near Windhelm.
string: 我尋獲一本書，裡面提到有一個波耶西亞的教團在風舵城附近的山上。

original: After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. The Jarl of Whiterun has agreed to help me trap a dragon in Dragonsreach. I've learned a Shout which is the name of one of Alduin's allies, which should serve to bring him to the Dragonsreach courtyard so I can trap him there. Then I can interrogate the dragon and learn the location of Alduin's lair so I can finish him off, once and for all.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。白漫領主答應幫我在龍臨堡捕獲一隻龍，我學會了一個新的以奧杜因同夥為名的龍吼，可以把一隻龍召喚到龍臨堡的庭院裡以便我設陷阱捕獲牠，然後就可以審問那隻龍以便獲悉奧杜因的巢穴然後一勞永逸地解決牠。

original: Return the Bust of the Gray Fox to Delvin
string: 把灰狐半身像帶給戴爾文

original: I've discovered some plans in Riftweald Manor. This must be where Mercer Frey is headed. I should bring these the Brynjolf as soon as possible.
string: 我在裂谷曠野莊園找到了一些計劃。這一定是墨瑟．弗雷現在要做的事。我必須把這些東西儘快帶給布林喬夫。

original: Retrieve the blade shards of Mehrunes' Razor
string: 取回梅魯涅斯利刃的刀刃碎片

original: After making arrangements with Kematu, I've delivered Saadia to him. He assures me that she will be taken back to Hammerfell alive, though after that her fate is no longer in his hands.
string: 與凱馬圖達成協議後，我把薩蒂亞交給他。他保證會將薩蒂亞活著帶回落錘省，不過之後的事情他就無法控制了。

original: Aela has tracked one of the Totems of Hircine to <Alias=Dungeon>, and has come with me to retrieve it.
string: 艾拉追蹤某個海爾辛圖騰到了<Alias=Dungeon>，她要和我一起去奪回它。

original: The Thalmor are just as puzzled as we are about why dragons are returning. I learned that they are looking for a Blade named Esbern, who Delphine says is an expert on ancient dragon lore. We need to find him before the Thalmor do.
string: 梭默和我們一樣困惑於龍的回歸。我得知他們在找一個叫做伊思本的刀鋒衛士，戴爾菲娜說他是一個龍族知識的專家。我們必須在梭默找到伊思本之前找到他。

original: I got carried away and killed <Alias=Brute>.

After I defeated Alduin on the top of the Throat of the World, he fled from me. One of his dragon allies may be able to tell me where he's gone. With the help of the Jarl of Whiterun, I've trapped the dragon Odahviing in Dragonsreach. Odahviing revealed that Alduin's lair is located in the ancient temple of Skuldafn, which is only accessible by air. Odahviing has offered to take me there, in return for his freedom.
string: 在世界咽喉之巔我打敗了奧杜因之後，牠逃走了。牠的一個巨龍夥伴也許能告訴我牠逃到了哪裡。在白漫領主的幫助下，我在龍臨堡捕獲了巨龍傲達威英。傲達威英揭示了奧杜因的巢穴位於斯庫達芬的先古神殿，並且只能從空中到達。為了換取牠的自由，牠願意載著我去。

original: Bring the Unusual Gem to Vex in the Thieves Guild
string: 把不尋常的寶石帶給盜賊公會的「小煩」看看

original: Boethiah has appeared using <Alias=DeadFriend>'s corpse as a vessel. She will give a special task to whichever of her cultists are left alive after we fight to the death.
string: 用<Alias=DeadFriend>做容器讓波耶西亞很開心。她會給我們殊死搏鬥後的倖存者一個特別任務。

original: There are those who believe that when night descends upon Skyrim, werewolves descend upon the unwary...
string: 有些人認為當夜幕降臨天際，狼人就會「造訪」那些不小心的人們……

original: Once a skill reaches 100, you can make it legendary. The skill is reset to 15, and all perks are converted to perk points. Making a skill legendary allows you to level your character almost indefinitely.
string: 一旦一項技能達到等級100時，你可以將其轉化為傳奇技能。此時技能等級將會降為15，並退還所有投資於其中的額外能力點數。透過將技能轉為傳奇技能，將使你的角色能夠無限昇級。

original: Those with the blood of a werewolf can never gain resting bonuses from sleeping.
string: 擁有狼人之血的人無法獲得睡眠帶來的增益加成。
提升50%對所有毒素的抗性。

original: Attacks with battle axes cause extra bleeding damage.
string: 用巨斧攻擊將造成額外流血傷害。

original: Arrows that hit the shield do no damage.
string: 擊中盾牌的箭將不會造成傷害。

original: Attacks with battle axes cause more bleeding damage.
string: 用巨斧攻擊將造成更多額外流血傷害。

original: Pickpocketing bonus of 100%. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.
string: 偷竊成功機率增加100%。物品的重量和價值影響成功率。

original: Unified perk for applying skill benefits from perks
string: 統一化套用技能效果所獲得的額外能力

original: All negative effects are removed from created potions, and all positive effects are removed from created poisons.
string: 製造藥水時將消除所有負面效果，製造毒藥時則消除所有增益效果。

original: Attacks with battle axes cause even more bleeding damage.
string: 用巨斧攻擊將造成非常多額外流血傷害。

original: Additional 25% Armor bonus if wearing a matched set of Heavy Armor.
string: 裝備整套相同的重甲將獲得額外25%護甲值。

original: Additional 25% Armor bonus if wearing a matched set of Light Armor.
string: 裝備整套相同的輕甲將獲得額外25%護甲值。

original: You can have two atronachs or reanimated zombies.
string: 你能同時號令兩個元素或兩個復活的僵屍。

original: The art of creating and improving weapons and armor from raw materials.
string: 用未加工的原料鍛造與強化裝備的技術。

original: Available now at the Fletcher in Solitude, eight crossbows made from the finest Tamrielic materials! Choose from simple but elegant crossbows of Imperial, Orcish, Silver, or Nordic design, or high grade versions of Glass, Stalhrim, Daedric and Dragonbone! Purchase these finely assembled weapons at the Fletcher, or acquire one and learn to craft them yourself! Created by Borja "Borx25" Franco.
string: 獨孤城的造箭者新增八種用頂級泰姆瑞爾材料製作的十字弓！有簡潔優雅的帝國、獸人、銀製或諾德設計，還有玻璃、魔冰岩、魔族和龍骨等高級十字弓可供選擇！你可以向造箭者購買這些作工精緻的武器，或是找一把來自己學怎麼製造！作者：Borja Franco（Borx25）。

original: In Survival Mode, your greatest adversary is Skyrim itself. Unrelenting cold, harsh wilderness, famine and fatigue -  do you have the strength to endure? (Creation can be turned on or off in Settings menu. For details, consult Help Menu.)
string: 生存模式中，你最大的敵人就是天際省本身：無情的低溫、嚴峻的荒野、飢餓和疲勞。你有能力熬過去嗎？（可在設定選單中開關本創作。如要了解詳情，請詳閱說明選單。）

original: Once known as a day of debauchery, Saturalia has since transformed into a time of gift giving and cheer. Celebrate the holidays with these festive Saturalia garments, and spread merriment across Skyrim on your very own reindeer! Created by Virginia "Steelfeathers" Smith (Outfit and mount obtained from Agrane Peryval, west of Dawnstar.)
string: 薩圖利亞曾經是放肆狂歡的節日，現在已轉變為送禮和歡樂的節日。穿上應景的薩圖利亞衣服歡慶佳節，騎上專屬馴鹿，到天際省各地散播歡樂氣息！作者：Virginia Smith（Steelfeathers）。（服裝和座騎可向晨星城西邊的阿格蘭．佩雷瓦爾購買。）

original: Wield this deadly dark bow, favored weapon of Syl, the Duchess of Dementia. Each arrow shot has the chance to cast a spell, like Paralyze, Silence, Demoralize or Frenzy. (Weapon is located in Stony Creek Cave far southeast of Windhelm.)
string: 這把致命的黑暗弓是癲曼希亞女爵席爾的愛弓。由這把弓射出的每支箭都有機率施展麻痺、沉默、士氣低落或狂亂等法術。（武器位於風舵城東南邊遠處的石頭溪谷洞穴中。）

original: Includes two pieces of heavy Dwarven armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Mightier than the Sword" starts by reading "Looter's Note" at the Silver-Blood Inn in Markarth.)
string: 內含兩件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型矮人護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在馬卡斯城的銀血客棧閱讀「劫掠者的紙條」即可開始任務：「筆鋒勝劍」。）

original: It's a mystery how, why, or where this faithful companion received his special armor, but one thing's for certain - nobody's seen a Mudcrab like this before. (Pet can be purchased from Calcelmo in Markarth.)
string: 沒有人知道這個忠誠的戰友到底是如何、為何、從何得到這身特殊護甲，但有一件事是肯定的：從來沒有人看過這樣的泥沼蟹。（此寵物可向馬卡斯城的卡塞莫購買。）

original: Rumored to have been wielded by Stendarr, the God of Righteous Might and Merciful Forbearance himself, this two-handed hammer will deliver devastation to any foe. (Weapon can by stolen from the Dwemer Museum in Markarth)
string: 據說這把雙手錘曾由公正與寬容之神斯坦德爾使用，可以對任何敵人帶來毀滅性的傷害。（可於馬卡斯城的鍛莫博物館竊取此武器。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Stalhrim armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Ancient Ice" starts by reading "Skjol's Journal" at the camp south-southwest of Skaal Village.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型魔冰岩護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在斯卡爾村南南西的營地閱讀「司寇德的日記」即可開始任務：「遠古寒冰」。）

original: The original Staff of Chaos, or Balac-thurm, was shattered into pieces and lost to time. In the years since, mages have sought to recreate its magic. Follow the path of these mages as you obtain an ancient ring and restore the artifacts of chaos, including two new staves and an enchanted amulet! Creation by PrivateEye. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "The Arms of Chaos" starts by reading "Hyenril's Jorunal" at Skytemple Ruins, north of the College of Winterhold.)
string: 原始的混沌之杖「巴拉克．瑟姆」早已碎裂，遺失在時間的洪流中。此後，法師不斷試圖重現混沌之杖的魔法。追隨這些法師的腳步，取得遠古指環，恢復混沌神器，包含兩把新法杖和一個附魔護符！創作作者：PrivateEye。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在冬堡學院北邊的天佑神殿遺址閱讀「海恩莉爾的日記」即可開始任務：「混沌之臂」。）

original: Behind the din of tavern chatter, two warriors are embroiled in an argument. To settle it, they embark on a quest to see who can slay a monstrous spider. Follow their trail and learn what became of them. Includes the legendary "Fists of Randagulf" and the "Ice Blade of the Monarch"! Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Caught in a Web" starts by reading "Adonato Leotelli's Journal" in Candlehearth Hall.)
string: 在酒館的嘈雜聲中，兩個戰士正吵得沸沸揚揚。為了解決爭論，他們決定踏上旅途，看看誰能殺死一隻怪誕蜘蛛。循著他們的蹤跡，查出兩人的結局。內含傳奇的「藍達格爾夫拳套」和「君主冰鋒」！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在燭爐堂客棧閱讀「阿多納托．萊奧特利的日記」即可開始任務：「蛛網纏身」。）

original: Sealed away in the depths of the Riften Ratways is a dark and terrible secret, and at its heart, a sword of two minds. Transformed by the light of the sun and the moons, Dawnfang and Duskfang grants you the power to wield fire and ice and drink the souls of the vanquished. But to do that, you must first free the soul that binds it. Quest created by Skinnytecboy. (Quest "A Soul Divided" starts by exploring the Riften Ratway)
string: 裂谷城鼠道深處封印著一個黑暗駭人的秘密，而秘密的核心就是這把一體兩面的劍。曉牙和暮牙經過陽光和月光的洗禮，讓用劍者可以操控火焰和寒冰，並吸取死於劍下的亡魂。在此之前，你必須先釋放束縛這把劍的靈魂。任務作者：Skinnytecboy。（探索裂谷城鼠道即可開始任務：「靈魂分裂」。）

original: Press [Move] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.
string: 按[Move]行走或奔跑；按[Jump]跳躍。按[Sprint]衝刺。衝刺會耗損精力。

original: In the mountains of the Reach is a grand Nordic hall, built in a tradition befitting the warriors of old. The walls are decorated in triumph, each piece a memory of its owner's lasting valor.   Created by Elianora. (Quest "Hendraheim" starts by reading the "Warrior's Challenge" delivered by courier upon reaching level 10.)
string: 邊塞領的山脈中座落了一間宏偉的諾德大廳。這棟建築按照適合遠古戰士的傳統工法建造而成，大廳內的裝潢各個都展示著主人流傳千古的豐功偉業。   作者：Elianora。（等級達到10後閱讀信使寄送的「戰士的挑戰」即可開始任務：「亨德拉海姆」。）

original: The legendary katana Goldbrand has been wielded by those who have turned the pages of history. Now, this weapon has returned to Skyrim, to the resting place of one such hero. Discover the ancien tomb and be the one to write its next chapter.  (Quest "A Matter of Pride" starts by finding Eranya in the Sacellum of Boethiah east of Windhelm.)
string: 傳說中的金印武士刀曾經由留名青史的偉人所用。現在這把武器重返天際省，回到其中一個傳奇英雄的安息之處。探索古老墓穴，成為下一個在歷史上留名的英雄。（在風舵城東邊的波耶西亞露天祭壇尋找爾安亞，即可開始任務：「攸關自尊」。）

original:
KINECT COMMANDS

Turn on Kinect functionality by going to SETTINGS->GAMEPLAY and check USE KINECT COMMANDS. Be sure to calibrate your Kinect sensor for sound first.

MAIN GAMEPLAY

"Quick Items" - Opens inventory menu
"Quick Magic" - Opens magic menu
"Quick Skills" - Opens stats menu
"Quick Map" - Opens map menu
"Quick Save" - Quick-saves the game
"Quick Load" - Quick-loads the game
"New Save" - Saves the game into a new save slot
"Pause Game" - Pauses the game

CHARACTER MENU
"Items" - Opens inventory menu
"Magic" - Opens magic menu
"Skills" - Opens skills menu
"Map" - Opens map menu

FAVORITES MENU
"Assign <hotkey command>" -  Sets the selected item to the spoken hotkey
"Health Potion"
"Magicka Potion"
"Stamina Potion"
"Poison"
"Sword"
"Mace"
"Axe"
"Dagger"
"Bow"
"Shield"
"Dual Wield Left"
"Dual Wield Right"
"Soul Trap"
"Greatsword"
"Battleaxe"
"Warhammer"
"Fire Spell"
"Frost Spell"
"Lightning Spell"
"Ward Spell"
"Ritual Spell"
"Bound Weapon"
"Summon Spell"
"Armor Spell"
"Calm Spell"
"Frenzy Spell"
"Healing Spell"
"Light"

HOTKEY EQUIPPING
Only usable during main gameplay
"Equip <hotkey command>" - Equips item in the default hand
"Equip Left <hotkey command>" - Equips item in the Left hand, if possible.
"Equip Right <hotkey command>" - Equips item in the Right hand, if possible.
"Equip Dual <hotkey command>" - Equips the item in both hands, if possible.

See above for definition of <hotkey command>
"Equip Sword And Shield" - Equips the item with the Sword hotkey in the right hand, and the item with the Shield hotkey in the left hand

Also: 
"Equip Mace and Shield"
"Equip Axe and Shield"
"Equip Dagger and Shield"
"Equip Dual Weapons" - Equips the item with the DualWieldLeft hotkey in the left hand, and the item with the DualWieldRight hotkey in the left hand.

FOLLOWER COMMANDS
Only usable during main gameplay.  Only valid if you have a follower.

"Ally Follow" or "Ally Follow Me" - Ally follows you as if you told them "Follow me."
"Ally Wait" or "Ally Wait Here" - Ally stays where they are
"Ally Trade" or "Ally Items" - Opens the Teammate menu
"Ally Open" - Commands the ally to open the container / door you’re looking at.
"Ally Stand" - Commands the ally to stand at the spot you’re looking at.
"Ally Retrieve" - Commands the ally to pick up the item you’re looking at.
"Ally Attack" - Commands the ally to attack the NPC you’re looking at.
"Ally Interact" or "Ally Use" - Does a generic Interact command with the ally.  Same as if you entered Command mode and pressed A.  What the ally does is dependent on what you’re looking at

SHOUTS
Only usable during main gameplay.  

Unrelenting Force - "Fus Ro Dah"

Dismaying Shout - "Faas Ru Maar"

Become Ethereal - "Feim Zii Gron"

Whirlwind Sprint - "Wuld Nah Kest"

Elemental Fury - "Su Grah Dun"

Clear Skies - "Lok Vah Koor"

Fire Breath - "Yol Toor Shul"

Dragonrend - "Joor Zah Frul"

Call of Valor - "Hun Kaal Zoor"

Call Dragon - "Od Ah Viing" (No 1st or 2nd level variations of this shout)

Animal Allegiance - "Raan Mir Tah"

Aura Whisper - "Laas Yah Nir"

Disarm - "Zun Haal Viik"

Marked For Death - "Krii Lun Aus"

Frost Breath - "Fo Krah Diin"

Storm Call - "Strun Bah Qo"

Kyne’s Peace - "Kaan Drem Ov"

Slow Time - "Tiid Klo Ul"

Throw Voice - "Zul Mey Gut"

Ice Form - "Iiz Slen Nus"


INVENTORY MENU
"Favorites"
"All"
"Weapons"
"Apparel" or "Armor"
"Potions"

"Food"
"Ingredients"
"Books"

"Sort By Weight" - Sorts the item list by weight, decreasing.  If the list is already sorted by weight decreasingly, sorts it increasingly.
"Sort By Value" - Sorts the item list by value, decreasing.  If the list is already sorted by value decreasingly, sorts it increasingly.
"Close Menu" - Closes the menu

BARTER MENU
Vendor categories - Open the item list for the spoken vendor category
"Their Items"

<value> can be 0, 5, 10, 25, 50 or 100.

string:
Kinect指令

依序前往「設定」->「遊戲」，勾選「使用Kinect指令」，即可開啟Kinect功能。務必先校正Kinect的聲音感應器。

主遊戲歷程

Quick Items（快速物品）：開啟道具欄選單
Quick Magic（快速魔法）：開啟魔法選單
Quick Skills（快速技能）：開啟技能選單
Quick Map（快速地圖）：開啟地圖選單
Quick Save（快速儲存）：快速儲存遊戲
Quick Load（快速載入）：快速載入遊戲
New Save（新存檔）：將遊戲儲存至新的存檔欄位
Pause Game（暫停遊戲）：將遊戲暫停

Items（物品）：開啟道具欄選單
Magic（魔法）：開啟魔法選單
Skills（技能）：開啟技能選單
Map（地圖）：開啟地圖選單

Dual Wield Left（雙持左手）
Dual Wield Right（雙持右手）

Greatsword（巨劍）
Battleaxe（巨斧）
Warhammer（戰錘）
Fire Spell（火焰法術）
Frost Spell（冰霜法術）
Lightning Spell（雷霆法術）
Ward Spell（防護法術）
Ritual Spell（儀式法術）
Bound Weapon（束縛武器）

裝備快速鍵
僅限於主遊戲歷程中使用
Equip <hotkey command>（裝備<hotkey command>）：將物品裝備於預設手
Equip Left <hotkey command>（左手裝備<hotkey command>）：將物品裝備於左手（如果可行的話）
Equip Right <hotkey command>（右手裝備<hotkey command>）：將物品裝備於右手（如果可行的話）
Equip Dual <hotkey command>（裝備雙手<hotkey command>）：將物品裝備於雙手（如果可行的話）

<hotkey command>定義請參見上方
Equip Sword And Shield（裝備劍與盾牌）：將設為劍快速鍵的物品裝備於右手；將設為盾牌快速鍵的物品裝備於左手

其他： 
Equip Mace and Shield（裝備釘錘與盾牌）
Equip Axe and Shield（裝備斧頭與盾牌）
Equip Dagger and Shield（裝備匕首與盾牌）
Equip Dual Weapons（裝備雙持武器）：將設為雙持左手快速鍵的物品裝備於右手；將設為雙持右手快速鍵的物品裝備於左手

追隨者指令
僅限於主遊戲歷程中使用。須有追隨者才能使用。

Ally Follow（盟友跟隨）或Ally Follow Me（盟友跟著我）：盟友會跟著你
Ally Wait（盟友等待）或Ally Wait Here（盟友在這等）：盟友會待在原地
Ally Trade（盟友交易）或Ally Items（盟友物品）：開啟隊友的選單
Ally Open（盟友打開）：命令盟友打開你正在看的容器或門
Ally Stand（盟友站立）：命令盟友站在你正在看的地方
Ally Retrieve（盟友取回）：命令盟友拾起你正在看的物品
Ally Attack（盟友攻擊）：命令盟友攻擊你正在看的NPC
Ally Interact（盟友互動）或Ally Use（盟友使用）：與盟友進行一般互動指令。效果與你進入命令模式並按下A一樣。盟友的行動取決於你正在看的人事物

original: Crafted by the Dwemer Tonal Architect Lord Kagrenac, Sunder and Wraithguard represent two of the three tools created to tap into the Heart of Lorkhan. Imbued with ancient magic, the weapons are said to empower not only their wielder, but each other. Additional Art Support by Elianora.  (Quest "Legends Lost" starts by reading the "Lost Caravan Guard's Note" at the New Gnisis Cornerclub in Windhelm.)
string: 薩恩德和幽守由鍛莫設計師卡格納克製造而成，是用以探入洛可汗之心的三個工具之二。這兩把武器融入了遠古魔法，據說不只能加強使用者的能力，還能互相加持。協力美術支援：Elianora。（在風舵城的新格尼西斯街角吧閱讀「消失的商隊衛兵的紙條」即可開始任務：「傳奇消散」。）

original: Beset with a jewel made of the highest quality stahlrim, these elegant, handcrafted jewelry pieces combine traditional Nordic design with an elegance fit for a Jarl. Each gem is expertly chosen for its purity, color, and magical affinity. The ornate setting is made of the finest quicksilver that is guaranteed to retain its finish. Choose from three craftable options including a Nordic amulet, ring, or circlet, and travel the holds of Skyrim with style and grace. (Quest "Nordic Jewelry" starts by reading the "Certificate of Authenticity" obtained if you buy Nordic jewelry from Madesi, Bersi Honey-Hand, Endarie, or Belethor.)
string: 這些優雅的手工珠寶鑲嵌了魔冰岩的高品質寶石，將傳統諾德設計融合適合領主穿戴的優雅線條。每一顆寶石都經過專業挑選，無論淨度、色澤，還是法力都無可挑剃。優雅的鑲嵌技術使用最精良的水銀，讓成品完美無缺。可從諾德護符、指環或頭環三種可製造飾品中挑選，讓你優雅時髦地穿梭在天際省的各個城堡內。（向瑪德希、波西．甜手、恩達蕊或貝萊托爾購買諾德珠寶可獲得「真品證書」，閱讀後即可開始任務：「諾德珠寶」。）

original: Rule over the realm of life and death with the Necromantic Arts pack. This creation features a unique necromancer robe with all new enchantments and variants, and 13 necromancy themed spells allowing you to conjure a wide variety of skeletons, apparitions, and powerful creatures, including the mighty Bone Colossus! Created by Virginia "Steelfeathers" Smith. (Items can be purchased at vendors and appear in containers.)
string: 取得死靈術士美術組合包，統御生靈和死靈。內含獨特死靈術士長袍，附帶全新附魔和各式異款，另有13個死靈術士法術，讓你可以召喚各式骷髏、鬼魂和強大生物，包含強力的骷髏巨人！作者：Virginia Smith（Steelfeathers）。（物品可向商人購買，或在容器中獲得。）

original: Give your hunting a magickal advantage with equipment specially designed for archers, like Telekinesis Arrows, Soul Stealer Arrows, and a unique power that equips a Bound Quiver. (Telekinesis arrows are found in The Arcanaeum in the College of Winterhold and Soul Stealer Arrows can be found in Kagrumez on Solstheim.  All other arrows can be purchased at vendors & appear in containers.)
string: 用專為弓手設計的裝備為你的狩獵過程增加法力優勢。內含念動箭、竊魂箭和能裝備召喚箭袋的特殊能力。（念動箭可於冬堡學院的秘藏館獲得；竊魂箭可於索瑟海姆的卡谷梅茲獲得。其他箭矢可向商人購買，或於容器中取得。）

original: Purchase land and build your own home from the ground up - from a simple one-room cottage to a sprawling compound complete with an armory, alchemy laboratory, stable, garden, and more. Use all-new tools like the drafting table and carpenter's workbench to transform quarried stone, clay, and sawn logs into structures and furnishings. Even transform your house into a home by adopting children.  (Land may be purchased from the Jarl in Dawnstar's White Hall, the steward in the Jarl's Longhouse in Falkreath Hold, or the steward in Morthal's Highmoon Hall.)
string: 購買土地，從頭開始建造自己的家園，從簡單的一房小屋到佔地廣大，擁有武器庫、煉金房、馬廄和花園等設施的宅院。使用製圖桌和木工台等全新工具，讓石材、黏土和鋸開的原木搖身一變，成為建築或傢俱。甚至可以收養小孩，讓你的房子變成真正的家（你可以找以下這些人購買土地：位於晨星城白色會堂的領主、位於佛克瑞斯城領主長屋的總管，或是位於墨索爾城懸月會堂的總管）。

original: Known as the Paladin's Blade and Sword of Heroes, this legendary claymore is imbued with powerful magic, like Fire Resistance, Spell Absorption, and devastating damage. (Weapon can be found in Forelhost southeast of Riften.)
string: 這把傳奇雙刃寬劍又稱為「聖殿騎士之刃」和「英雄之劍」，劍上附有強大的魔法，如火焰抗性、法術吸收和毀滅傷害等。（此武器可於裂谷城東南邊的皮紙主人獲得。）

original: Press [Forward]/[Back]/[Strafe Left]/[Strafe Right] to walk or run, or [Jump] to jump. Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting drains your stamina.
string: 按[Forward]/[Back]/[Strafe Left]/[Strafe Right]行走或奔跑；按[Jump]跳躍。按[Sprint]衝刺。衝刺會耗損精力。

original: Old forts have long been bastions for the dead, as mortals both wicked and misunderstood have hung from their gallows. Here, a necromancer can find a home, filling its coffers with treasures that suit the morbid and macabre - provided they survive it. Claim the legendary Bloodworm Helm, Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw, and the Staff of Worms to wield the power of Mannimarco himself! Created by Rich Marin. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Dreams of the Dead" starts by reading "Naara's Journal" within the abandoned fort on the northern edge of Mara's Eye Pond.)
string: 老舊的堡壘向來是死靈徘徊的要塞，這是因為許多惡人和冤死之人都被處死在堡壘的絞刑架上。死靈術士能以這裡為家，將金庫中裝滿陰沉恐怖的寶物。但前提是你要能活著攻下這裡。取得傳奇血蟲頭盔、奧林．熊爪之盔和蛆蟲法杖，藉此駕馭曼尼馬克的力量！作者：Rich Marin。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在瑪拉之眼池塘北部邊緣的廢棄堡壘中閱讀「娜拉的日記」即可開始任務：「亡者之夢」。）

original: This creation features multiple quests, a new dungeon, two artifacts, several new sets of weapons and armor, recruitable pets, alchemy ingredients, summoning spells, and more all from the realm of the Mad God Sheogorath!  Additional art support by Elianora.  Additional design by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Balance of Power" starts by talking to the traveling Khajiit Merchant Ri'saad.)
string: 這個創作內含多項任務、一個全新地下城、兩個神器和數套全新武器和護甲、可招募的寵物、鍊金術材料、召喚法術，以及更多來自瘋神謝爾格拉領地的精彩內容！協力美術支援：Elianora。協力設計：Kris Takahashi。（和虎人雲遊商人瑞撒德交談即可開始任務：「勢力平衡」。）

original: Now you too, can wield the powerful equipment of the Divine Crusader, Pelinal Whitestrake - once reserved only for the revered Knights of the Nine. Created by Maty743. (Armor can be found by exploring Four Skull Lookout far east-northeast of Markarth.)
string: 現在你也可以使用神靈十字軍培力納．白擊的強大裝備。據說這些裝備以前只能由九聖靈的神聖騎士們使用。作者：Maty743。（探索馬卡斯城東北東遠處的四顱哨塔，即可獲得護甲。）

original: Pet will be waiting at the specified location.
string: 寵物會在指定地點等待。

original: Alchemists have always known that the rarest ingredients bring life to the most powerful potions. This is why Khajiit caravans have brought along rare imports from the far reaches of Tamriel, from the Ashlands of Morrowind to the twisted gardens of the Shivering Isles. With these ingredients in hand, you can craft new potions, arrows, and poisons, including the poisoned apple favored by assassins. You can also find rare stones crafted by the Ayleids, as things exotic and foreign make their way to Skyrim. (Items added to Khajiit merchant vendors.)
string: 鍊金術士向來很清楚，使用的材料越稀有就能調製出越強大的藥水。因此虎人商隊從泰姆瑞爾四處進口了稀有的商品，來源從晨風省的灰燼之地到戰慄孤島扭曲的藥園，應有盡有。有了這些材料就能調配全新藥水、箭矢、毒素，包含刺客愛用的毒蘋果。隨著各式珍稀奇物進入天際省，你還能找到亞曆德人製造的稀有石頭。（虎人商人增加新商品。）

original: In Skyrim, when the sun falls, the dead rise! Beat back the zombie hordes, and retrieve valuable Mort Flesh.  (Creations appear at night at certain locations in the world and through a quest.)  (Quest "The Rising Dead" starts by reading an "Anonymous Letter" delivered by courier upon reaching level 5.)
string: 太陽落下後，天際省的死者將再次甦醒！擊退不死屍群，並取得珍貴的屍肉。（本創作內容會在某些地點入夜後出現，也會在一個任務中出現。）（等級達到5後閱讀信使寄送的「匿名信」即可開始任務：「活死人」。）

original: Your horse's armor has been changed.

A thief does not fear the dark, for they call the shadows home. Shadowfoot Sanctum is a brand new player domicile nestled in the dark underbelly of the Riften Ratways. With a secret sewer entrance and easy access to the Thieves Guild, Shadowfoot Sanctum provides both convenience and concealment for any aspiring thief, as well as a secret room to display your spoils with discretion. Created by Elianora. (House can be purchased from Vekel the Man in the Ragged Flagon in the Riften Ratway.)
string: 盜賊從不懼怕黑暗，因他們以暗影為家。影足聖所是一間全新的玩家住宅，隱藏於裂谷城鼠道的暗處。影足聖所設有隱密的下水道出入口，並能快速通向盜賊公會，不只出入方便，還適合當做盜賊宵小的藏身處，內含密室可用來偷偷展示你的戰利品。作者：Elianora。（房子可在裂谷城鼠道的漏壺向勇士威克爾購買。）

original:
Only usable during main gameplay. You must have the shout unlocked to the level you want to use, and you can say the Shout in English or in Dragon Language.

1. English Language: Available without holding RB. Just say the name. e.g. UNRELENTING FORCE, and the highest known level of the shout will trigger.

2. Dragon Language: Only available when holding RB. 

Note: To use Shouts or Powers while Kinect is enabled using the controller, press LB + RB at same time.


Unrelenting Force - "Fus Ro Dah"

Dismaying Shout - "Faas Ru Maar"

Become Ethereal - "Feim Zii Gron"

Whirlwind Sprint - "Wuld Nah Kest"

Elemental Fury - "Su Grah Dun"

Clear Skies - "Lok Vah Koor"

Fire Breath - "Yol Toor Shul"

Dragonrend - "Joor Zah Frul"

Call of Valor - "Hun Kaal Zoor"

Call Dragon - "Od Ah Viing" (No 1st or 2nd level variations of this shout)

Animal Allegiance - "Raan Mir Tah"

Aura Whisper - "Laas Yah Nir"

Disarm - "Zun Haal Viik"

Marked For Death - "Krii Lun Aus"

Frost Breath - "Fo Krah Diin"

Storm Call - "Strun Bah Qo"

Kyne’s Peace - "Kaan Drem Ov"

Slow Time - "Tiid Klo Ul"

Throw Voice - "Zul Mey Gut"

Ice Form - "Iiz Slen Nus"
string:
僅限於主遊戲歷程中使用。必須將龍吼解鎖至自己想使用的等級；你可以用英語或龍語發動招式。

1英語：無須按住RB也能使用。只要說出招式名稱，就能發動該龍吼最高等級的能力，例如「Unrelenting Force」（冷酷之力）。

2龍語：須按住RB才能使用。 

注意：在啟用Kinect的情況下，使用控制器同時按下LB + RB就能使用龍吼或力量。


Unrelenting Force（冷酷之力）：Fus Ro Dah

Dismaying Shout（震懾之吼）：Faas Ru Maar

Become Ethereal（化做飄渺）：Feim Zii Gron

Whirlwind Sprint（旋風疾走）：Wuld Nah Kest

Elemental Fury（元素之怒）：Su Grah Dun

Clear Skies（澄澈天空）：Lok Vah Koor

Fire Breath（火焰吐息）：Yol Toor Shul

Dragonrend（龍破）：Joor Zah Frul

Call of Valor（勇氣召喚）：Hun Kaal Zoor

Call Dragon（召喚巨龍）：Od Ah Viing（此招龍吼不分第1級或第2級）

Animal Allegiance（獸之效忠）：Raan Mir Tah

Aura Whisper（氣息密語）：Laas Yah Nir

Disarm（解除武裝）：Zun Haal Viik

Marked For Death（死亡印記）：Krii Lun Aus

Frost Breath（冰霜吐息）：Fo Krah Diin

Storm Call（風暴召喚）：Strun Bah Qo

Kyne’s Peace（凱娜的平靜）：Kaan Drem Ov

Slow Time（放慢時間）：Tiid Klo Ul

Throw Voice（聲東擊西）：Zul Mey Gut

Ice Form（冰塑）：Iiz Slen Nus

original: Press [Sprint] to sprint. Sprinting will drain your stamina.
string: 按[Sprint]衝刺。衝刺會耗損精力。

original: The crossbow has long been the weapon of choice for skilled hunters, whether the prey be animals of the forest or creatures of the night. Forged from the rarest of metals, the Ebony and Elven crossbows represent two of the most deadly ranged weapons in all of Tamriel.  (Quest "Night Hunter" starts by reading "Kragrash's Letter" at Ironback Hideout northwest of Solitude.)
string: 十字弓一直以來都是優秀獵人的愛用武器，不管獵物是森林中的動物，還是暗夜中的生物，十字弓都能派上用場。黑檀岩和精靈十字弓用極稀有的金屬鍛造而成，是全泰姆瑞爾數一數二致命的遠程武器。（在獨孤城西北邊的鐵背藏身處閱讀「克朗格拉許的信」即可開始任務：「夜之獵人」。）

original: Your horse's armor has been removed.

In the midst of an unending war, the Stormcloaks and Imperials have agreed to a duel. Two champions are to meet on the field of battle, to decide once and for all whose warriors are the fiercest. Choose a side, don the armor of the champion, and prove your mettle. Created by Borja "Borx25" Franco. Quest created by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Battle of the Champions" starts by reading "Battle of Champions" at The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun or waiting for a letter from a commanding officer.)
string: 在一場永無止境的戰爭中，風暴斗篷和帝國人同意舉行決鬥。雙方各派出一個勇士到戰場上一較高下，藉此決定哪一方的戰士最驍勇善戰。選邊站，穿上勇士的護甲，展現你的實力。作者：Borja Franco（Borx25）。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在白漫城的醉獵戶閱讀「勇士之戰」，或等待指揮官的來信，即可開始任務：「勇士之戰」。）

original: Don't head off into the wilderness without your Adventurer's Backpack. Craft 16 variations with assorted effects! Created by Rob Vogel (fadingsignal). (Backpacks can be purchased at vendors and crafted via Forge.)
string: 外出探險前記得先帶上你的冒險家背包。可製造效果各異的16種異款！作者：Rob Vogel（fadingsignal）。（背包可向商人購買，或使用熔爐製造。）

original: Become a powerful beastmaster with the Skyrim Pet Pack. Rescue tamed creatures and recruit them as your trusted followers. Use their unique abilities to adapt and thrive as you explore the breadth of Skyrim. From stealthy foxes to web-spinning spiders - as well as goats, rabbits, and skeevers - you can recruit the pet that best matches your gameplay. With five different animal species to choose from, there's a fun and furry companion for every adventurer.  (Quest "Pets of Skyrim" starts by reading the note "For Sale" in The Bannered Mare.)
string: 取得天際省寵物組合包，成為強大的馴獸師。救援馴化的生物，並將牠們收為忠誠的追隨者。善用寵物獨特的能力，幫助你在探索遼闊的天際省時適應並征服環境。從矯捷的狐狸到擅長織網的蜘蛛，以及山羊、兔子和惡鼠，應有盡有。方便你招募最適合自己遊戲風格的寵物。組合包內含五種不同動物種類，每個冒險者一定都能找到適合自己的毛夥伴。（在敕旗母馬客棧閱讀「出售」紙條即可開始任務：「天際省的寵物」。）

original: A tribe of hungry Rieklings seeks your aid to help hunt down a large bull netch. It's not the meat or jelly they wish to consume, however, but its leather. Help the tribe sate their stomachs or save them from their misguided appetites. Featuring the return of Netch Leather armor, including two additional skins. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "More Than You Can Chew" starts by reading the "Peddler's Journal" on a body of a Dark Elf north-northwest of Skaal Village, and southeast of Haknir's Shoal.)
string: 一個飢餓的藍客靈部落需要你幫忙獵捕一隻巨型雄耐區。牠們想吃的不是耐區的肉，也不是膠質，而是耐區皮革。幫助這個部落果腹，或拯救牠們別誤食耐區皮革。耐區革製護甲回歸，並另外加入兩個造型。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（位於斯卡爾村北北西和海科尼爾的淺灘東南邊有一具暗精靈的屍體，閱讀屍體上的「小販的日記」即可開始任務：「不自量力」。）

original: Deep in the heart of Hjaalmarch lies a tower of unknown provenance. Legends say it was a home and hearth, an exquisitely decorated residence built by mages who defected from the College of Winterhold. But whatever its secrets, the truth can only be known by finding a way in. Created by Elianora. (Quest "Myrwatch" starts by traveling to the tower east of Morthal, and reading "Hans's Journal" nearby.)
string: 希雅陲領的深處有一座來源不明的高塔。傳說這座塔由冬堡學院判逃的法師建造而成，裝潢精美，曾是一個五臟俱全的溫暖家園。無論這座塔到底藏有什麼秘密，只有想辦法進入塔中，才能查明真相。作者：Elianora。（前往墨索爾城東邊的高塔，並閱讀附近的「漢斯的日記」即可開始任務：「魔守」。）

original: Includes four pieces of light Orcish armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Gambler's Edge" starts by reading "Guard's Dossier: Antonius" at the Mistveil Keep Barracks in Riften.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型獸人護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在裂谷城的霧隱堡壘軍營閱讀「衛兵檔案：安東尼斯」即可開始任務：「賭徒優勢」。）

original: In the aftermath of the Red Year, worship of the Tribunal has been replaced by the Reclamation. Yet the strands of memory linger on Solstheim, the chant of ALMSIVI muttered by rebel priests and devotees of the old way. Includes over a dozen weapons and several armors featured in the Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind, including Hopesfire, Trueflame, and masks of the Tribunal. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Ghosts of the Tribunal" starts by reading "Heretic Dossier: Blacksmith's Confessional" at the Temple in Raven Rock.)
string: 紅色年代過後，裁決者信仰被收復者信仰取代。然而在索瑟海姆，回憶依舊殘存，仍有反叛祭司和崇拜古老信仰的人誦讀著愛瑪索維的禱詞。內含《Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind》登場過的數十種武器和護甲，包含希望之火、真焰和裁決者面具。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（閱讀鴉石鎮神殿的「異端檔案：鐵匠的懺悔」即可開始任務：「裁決者幽靈」。）

original: Includes three pieces of light Daedric armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Missing Merchant" starts by speaking to the innkeeper of Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.)
string: 內含三件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型魔族護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在風舵城和燭爐堂客棧的客棧老闆交談即可開始任務：「失蹤的商人」。）

original: Test your mettle as a fisherman in a brand new series of fishing quests, and catch over twenty new aquatic species in waters across Skyrim! Cook them or display them in Lakeview Manor, Heljarchen Hall and Windstad Manor in your home aquarium!  (Initial quest, "Angler Acquaintances", starts by using any Fishing Supplies scattered across Skyrim.)
string: 完成全新釣魚系列任務，挑戰你的釣魚技術，在天際省各水域釣魚，收集超過二十種全新水生生物！釣到的獵物可以拿來料理，也可以放入在湖景莊園、赫雅根大廳和風城莊園的水族箱中展示！（使用天際省各地的釣魚用具即可開始初始任務：「熟門熟路的釣客」。）

original: From the caves of Cyrodiil comes a horde of these feisty green creatures, led by a mysterious "Blue God" wielding a Goblin Staff. Includes new encounters, an ingredient, and a recruitable goblin! Quest by Kris Takahashi. Art support by ElleH. (Quest "Blue in the Face" starts by reading "Letter to Clexius" at The Bee and Barb in Riften.)
string: 這些凶猛的綠色生物由手拿哥布林法杖的神秘「藍神」帶領，從賽瑞迪爾的洞穴中成群竄出。內含全新遭遇互動內容、新材料和一個可招募的哥布林！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。美術支援：ElleH。（在裂谷城的蜂與鉤閱讀「給克雷希斯的信」即可開始任務：「面色鐵青」。）

original:
Mods are user generated content created by fans using the Creation Kit and shared on Bethesda.net. To play with Mods, create a Bethesda.net account at https://account.bethesda.net/en/login. Once you log in, you'll be able to browse, download and manage Mods.

When playing with Mods, the game will create a new set of saved games for the character you decide to use, so your original saves will remain intact. They will appear in the Load menu as [Modded]. If you decide not to play with Mods, you can disable or delete any downloaded Mods and go back to the last, unmodded saved game.

LOAD ORDER
The Load Order menu allows you to manage the Mods you have downloaded. 

Enable/Disable/Delete: Enable Mods that you want to play with. When you no longer want to play with a Mod, Disable or Delete it.

Reorder: Reordering Mods allows you to prioritize which Mods load first. Changing the load order is important when running several Mods to resolve conflicts between them.
string:
改造配件是玩家粉絲利用Bethesda.net提供的創作套件所製作的使用者創作內容。如果想在遊戲內加入改造配件，請先至https://account.bethesda.net/en/login建立Bethesda.net帳號。登入之後即可瀏覽、下載並管理改造配件。

在遊戲內加入改造配件之後，遊戲會為你決定要使用的角色建立一組新存檔，以保持原有存檔的完整。新存檔會在載入選單上顯示為[+改造]。如果你決定不再使用改造配件，只要停用或刪除所有下載的改造配件，返回上一次未使用改造的遊戲存檔即可。

載入順序
你可以從載入順序選單管理下載的改造配件。 

啟用／停用／刪除：啟用欲加入遊戲的改造配件。當你不想再使用改造配件，只需停用或刪除即可。

重新排序：你可以利用重新排序調整改造配件的載入優先順序。變更載入順序非常重要，可以避免同時執行多個改造配件時可能發生的衝突。

original: Operate the downstairs Manufactory and build automatons to restore this cavernous home to its original luster. Once rebuilt, its spacious halls make it the perfect residence for any fan of Dwemer architecture and engineering. Creation by Flenarn and Arthmoor. (Quest starts by reading "Seeks-Ancient-Artifacts' Journal, v1" in the Frozen Hearth in Winterhold.)
string: 善用樓下的製造廠，建造機器，讓這間寬大的房子重現往昔的榮光。重建後，這間寬敞的房間適合喜愛鍛莫建築和工程的人居住。創作作者：Flenarn和Arthmoor。（閱讀冬堡凍爐客棧的「遠古神器追尋者的日記，卷一」即可開始任務。）

original: Found in the wilderness of Solstheim, a tamed Nix-Hound can be adopted as your faithful companion. Nix-Hounds can carry items, and scrounge for useful ingredients. (Pet can be purchased from Revus Sarvani near Tel Mithryn or Geldis Sadri at the The Retching Netch Corner Club in Raven Rock if the former is deceased.  Hostile Nix-Hounds can be found in the Solstheim wilderness.)
string: 索瑟海姆的荒野中有一隻馴化的尼克斯獵犬，你可以收留牠作為忠誠的戰友。尼克斯獵犬可以馱載物品，還能搜刮實用的材料。（寵物可向泰爾密希臨附近的雷孚士．沙瓦尼購買，若雷孚士．沙瓦尼已死亡，則可在鴉石鎮的嘔吐耐區角落俱樂部向吉迪思．薩德里購買。具攻擊性的尼克斯獵犬會在索瑟海姆荒野出沒。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Orcish armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Smith 'n Slash" starts by reading "Guard's Dossier: Yakhtu gra-Orkulg" at the Guard Barracks inside the gate in Whiterun.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型獸人護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在白漫城城門內的衛兵軍營中閱讀「衛兵檔案：雅庫圖．葛拉厄古格」即可開始任務：「致命鐵匠」。）

original: Includes four pieces of light heavy Ebony armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Heart of Crimson" starts by reading the "Letter from Tyra Blood-Fire" delivered by courier upon reaching level 32.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型重型黑檀岩護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（等級達到32後閱讀信使寄送的「泰拉．血焰的信」即可開始任務：「緋紅之心」。）

original: Perched high in the mountains to the north. This unique player home features several multi-level living quarters, including a dungeon area and bed coffins perfect for wardens of the night. Created by Elianora. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Guests for Dinner" starts by reading the "Dinner Invitation" delivered by courier upon reaching level 12.)
string: 這間獨特的玩家住宅座落在北邊的高山上，有多層起居空間，包含地牢區和棺材床，最適合暗夜守衛居住。作者：Elianora。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（等級達到12後閱讀信使寄送的「晚餐邀約」即可開始任務：「餐桌上的賓客」。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Dragon Plate armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades plus the famed Dragonbone Mail. Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Bones for a Crow" can be provided when asking an innkeeper if they've heard any rumors lately.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型龍骨板甲，以及著名的龍骨鏈甲。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（向客棧老闆詢問最近的傳聞，即可開始任務：「烏鴉骨骸」。）

original: From robes that grant spellcasting bonuses, to ancient tomes holding powerful spells like Paralysis Rune and Unbounded Frost, this pack will increase any mage's effectiveness. (Robes and Spells can be purchased at vendors and appear in containers.)
string: 這個組合包內含各式物品，從加成施術能力的長袍，到內含麻痺術符文和無限寒霜等強大法術的書本，絕對能大大提升法師的能力。（長袍和法術可向商人購買，或在容器中獲得。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Iron armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Brothers in Irons" starts by reading "Nightgate Inn Patron's Note" in Nightgate Inn.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型鐵製護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在夜扉客棧閱讀「夜扉客棧客人的紙條」即可開始任務：「鋼鐵兄弟情」。）

original: The history of this Daedric artifact is recounted in the rise and fall of those that have wielded it. Forged from wicked hands and vile mind, legend says that Umbra itself lives. Umbra introduces a brand new dungeon to Skyrim featuring stunning visuals, puzzle solving, and an exhilarating boss fight! (Quest "Vile Whispers" starts by reading the "Vigilant's Report" in Champion's Rest, found in the mountains north-northeast of Riften.)
string: 這個魔族神器的歷史撰寫在其使用者的興衰之中。傳說中暗影出自於邪惡的雙手和惡毒的心靈，甚至具有自己的生命。「暗影」為天際省新增全新地下城，包含令人驚豔的視覺體驗、解謎和驚心動魄的頭目戰！（在裂谷城北北東山區的勇士陵墓閱讀「警戒者的報告」即可開始任務：「邪惡低語」。）

original: Forgotten Seasons offers a brand new dungeon adventure featuring work from a number of creators. In addition to its spacious exploration, the creation provides a myriad of unique rewards including a new mount, armor, items, and perks, many of which feature custom art assets and designs. Created by Trainwiz. Dwarven Crown by PrivateEye. Additional art support by Elianora. Additional art support by Rob Vogel "fadingsignal". Additional design by Kris Takahashi.  (Search for the Runoff Caverns west of Lost Valley Redoubt.)
string: 「遺落的四季」內含全新地下城冒險，包含數名作者的作品。除了寬闊的探險地區以外，也提供各式獨特獎勵，包含全新座騎、護甲、物品和額外能力。以上獎勵大多使用作者自製的美術設計。作者：Trainwiz。矮人王冠作者：PrivateEye。協力美術支援：Elianora。協力美術支援：Rob Vogel（fadingsignal）。協力設計：Kris Takahashi。（在失落溪谷據點西邊尋找逕流洞穴。）

original: Despite being raised by necromancers, a Bone Wolf's true loyalty is earned through actions rather than magic. A faithful companion with a bone to pick, this skeletal pet will reward your friendship by carrying items and boosting your damage against the undead. Quest created by Skinnytecboy. (Quest "Let Sleeping Wolves Lie" starts by reading the "Letter from Bolgeir Bearclaw" delivered by courier after completion of "The Wolf Queen Awakened".)
string: 骨狼雖然由死靈術士培育，但牠們的的忠心並非源於魔法，而是出於對對方行為的認可。這個骷髏寵物是雞蛋裡挑不出骨頭的忠誠夥伴。為了回報你的友誼，牠會幫忙馱載物品，還能提高你對不死生物的傷害。任務作者：Skinnytecboy。（完成「狼女王甦醒」後，閱讀波蓋爾．熊爪派信使送來的信，即可開始任務：「沉睡之狼」。）

original: You must dismiss one of your pets before you can recruit another.
string: 你必須放棄其中一隻寵物，才能收編另一隻寵物。

original: The horses of Skyrim are hardy and strong, and taming them requires grit and patience. Use a hostler's map to find these animals in the wild and mount them, and try not to get bucked! Once tamed, you can register them at the nearest stable and customize their saddles, as well as the saddles of any other horse you own. You may even find the rare unicorn brought back from dead, to right a wrong of the past. (Quest to find a unicorn, "Creature of Legend", can be found by reading "Soran's Journal" at the Arcanaeum.  A map to other horses may be purchased at any hostler.)
string: 天際省的馬匹耐操又強壯，想要馴服馬匹就需要毅力和耐心。用馬夫的地圖在野外找出馬匹的位置並騎上馬背，小心別被甩下馬！馴服馬匹後，你可以在附近的馬廄註冊馬匹，並為你擁有的馬匹更換馬鞍。你說不定還能找到有人為了矯正過往錯誤而將其復活的稀有獨角獸。（在秘藏館閱讀「索蘭的日誌」即可開始任務：「傳奇生物」。野馬地圖可向任何馬夫購買。）

original: The legend of the Gray Fox is known throughout history, yet the ones who wear the cowl remain nameless. To become the next Gray Fox, you must first restore the identity of the Cowl's bearer, and only then can your crimes be bereft of a name. Quest created by Kris Takahashi (Quest "The Gray Cowl of Noctural" starts by confronting a thief in the Riften graveyard.)
string: 灰狐的傳說在歷史上家喻戶曉，然而穿戴過灰巾的人卻沒有留名。想成為下一任灰狐，就必須先讓灰巾持有者恢復他的身分。如此一來，你才能犯罪不留名。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在裂谷城墓園和一名小偷對質即可開始任務：「諾克圖娜爾的灰巾」。）

original: Adorn the armor of the Spell Knight, the Keepers of the Crypt of Hearts, renowned throughout High Rock for their bravery and valor. Learn the story of the Spell Knight whose heart was stolen by a witch and obtain the armor that was their standard. The Spell Knight Armor comes in three variants, including iron, steel, and ebony! Creation by ElleH. Quest by Kris Takahashi  (Quest "Crypt of the Heart" starts by reading "Crypt of the Heart - Draft" at the Silver-Blood Inn in Markarth.)
string: 穿上法術騎士的護甲吧。法術騎士是心之墓穴的守護者，因其英勇的事蹟，在高岩省內名聞遐邇。了解法術騎士的心如何被女巫奪走，並取得騎士的標準護甲。法術騎士護甲有三個異款：鐵製、鋼製和黑檀岩！創作作者：ElleH。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在馬卡斯城的銀血客棧閱讀「心之墓穴草稿」即可開始任務：「心之墓穴」。）

original: Your horse is already wearing that armor.

It's said the wizard Hasedoki traveled all of Tamriel in search of his equal, before binding his soul to a staff. Through the years this mysterious weapon has changed many hands, as if warding off anyone who isn't worthy enough to claim it. Now, it's your turn. Quest created by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "The Staff of Hasedoki" starts by reading the "Smuggler's Trade Notes" at the bandit camp west of Dragonsreach.)
string: 據說哈塞朵其為了尋找和他實力相當的人，一路旅行到了泰姆瑞爾，最後將他的靈魂束縛在一把法杖上。多年來這把神秘武器易主多次，彷彿在排斥沒有資格使用它的人。現在輪到你一試了。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在龍臨堡西邊的強盜營地中閱讀「走私者的交易筆記」即可開始任務：「哈塞朵其法杖」。）

original: Includes three pieces of light Elven Hunter armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Once a Hunter" starts by reading "Guard Dossier: Aesrael" in the Falkreath Barracks.)
string: 內含三件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型精靈獵人護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在佛克瑞斯軍營閱讀「衛兵檔案：艾瑟列」即可開始任務：「曾為獵人」。）

original:
Once a skill has reached a value of 100, you have the option to make it Legendary on the Perk screen. This option resets the skill to a value of 15, and clears all its perks. You get back the perk points for all the perks that have been cleared.

Making a skill Legendary allows you to continue to level up your character beyond the normal level limit.
string:
當技能值達到100，你可以在額外能力畫面，選擇將它變成「傳說級」。這麼做會將該技能的值重置為15，並清除其所有額外能力。系統會將所有遭清除的額外能力換算成額外能力點數，返還給你。

將技能改為傳說級，可讓角色突破正常的等級限制，繼續升級。

original: To obtain the legendary Shadowrend - an enchanted sword or battleaxe of tremendous power - you need only face the most worthy foe imaginable: yourself. Quest implemented by Richard "unoctium" Edwards (Quest "Through a Glass, Darkly" starts by claiming the weapon in the hot springs near the Atronach Stone.)
string: 影裂是一把威力驚人的附魔劍或巨斧。想要獲得這把傳奇武器就必須對抗最難纏的敵人：你自己。套用任務作者：Richard Edwards（unoctium）。（在元素之石附近的溫泉中取得此武器即可開始任務：「在漆黑中穿越玻璃」。）

original: The Vampire Lord Harkon has returned to power. By using the Elder Scrolls, he seeks to do the unthinkable - to end the sun itself. Will you join the ancient order of the Dawnguard and stop him? Or will you become a Vampire Lord yourself? Featuring an all new faction questline and locations, the ultimate choice will be yours.  (Quest "Dawnguard" starts upon hearing rumors of the Dawnguard or by being approached by Durak upon reaching level 10.)
string: 吸血鬼領主赫岡東山再起。他打算利用上古捲軸達成一個難以想像的目標：消滅太陽。你會選擇加入古老的暮光守衛組織來阻止他？還是自己成為吸血鬼領主？內含全新陣營任務線和地點，最終的決定由你做主。（聽見與暮光守衛相關的傳言，或在等級達到10後與杜拉克交談，即可開始任務：「暮光守衛」。）

original: Connect with a network of Redguard agents known as the Remnants, and help them recover one of their own from the Thalmor. Includes a brand new set of light armor plus two new weapons, such as the legendary Yokudan sword Boneshaver! Created by ElleH and Jose McCallum "Shoeburglar." (Quest "Interception" starts by talking to Azadi in Shor's Stone far north of Riften.)
string: 和號稱「殘餘者」的紅衛人間諜網路取得聯繫，幫助他們從梭默手中救出自己人。內含一套全新輕型護甲和兩把全新武器，如傳奇猶庫達劍「削骨者」！作者：ElleH和Jose McCallum（Shoeburglar）。（在裂谷城北邊遠處的朔爾之石和阿薩迪交談即可開始任務：「攔截」。）

original: Forged by Nocturnal and used by assassins, it grants the user the gifts of invisibility and speed. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "In the Shadows" starts by speaking to the Jarl's Steward in Dragonsreach.)
string: 這把弓由諾克圖娜爾鑄造，是刺客的好幫手，可讓使用者隱形並提高速度。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在龍臨堡和領主的總管交談即可開始任務：「暗影之中」。）

original: Features seven classic staves from the Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind. Purchase staves with unique enchantments from Master Neloth, or buy an unenchanted staff and apply one yourself! (Items appear at vendors and in chests.)
string: 內含於《Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind》登場的七把經典法杖。可向尼洛施大師購買具有獨特附魔的法杖，或是買一把未附魔的法杖自己進行附魔！（可透過商人或寶箱獲得物品。）

original: Journey off the coast of Morrowind, to the island of Solstheim. Encounter new towns, dungeons, and quests, as you traverse the ash wastes and glacial valleys of this new land. Become more powerful with new shouts that bend the will of your enemies and even tame dragons. Your fate, and the fate of Solstheim, hangs in the balance as you face off against your deadliest adversary - the first Dragonborn.  (Quest "Dragonborn" starts after being attacked by Cultists upon completion of "The Way of the Voice".)
string: 從晨風省的海岸出發，前往索瑟海姆島。當你橫越這片新大陸的灰燼荒野和冰蝕河谷，不僅會遇到許多新城鎮、地下城，還能接到各種任務。裝備能增強戰力的全新龍吼，不只能撼動敵人的意志，還能馴服龍。你的命運和索瑟海姆的命運都懸在一線。全看你怎麼面對最致命的對手：第一個龍裔。（完成「聲之道」並遭受邪教徒攻擊後，即可開始任務：「龍裔」。）

original: The Bloodfall Queen has had her cleaver stolen by an old foe. Track the bandits to their hideout, and claim the Headman's Cleaver as your reward. The Queen can replace the weapon. What she desires is revenge. Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Blood in the Water" can be provided when asking an innkeeper if they've heard any rumors lately.)
string: 血瀑女王的砍刀被以前的敵人偷走了。追蹤這幫強盜，找出他們的藏身處，並奪走領袖砍刀做為獎賞。女王不介意換一把武器，她真正想要的是復仇。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（向客棧老闆詢問最近的傳聞，即可開始任務：「血溶於水」。）

original: Make Skyrim that much more accommodating with this cozy placeable campsite, complete with a lean-to for sleeping, campfire for warmth and some cooking, and a new fast travel marker (Creation craftable via Forge)
string: 帶上這個舒適的可放置營地，讓天際省更適合人居。內含睡覺用的小棚子，取暖和料理用的營火，以及全新快速移動傳送點。（可用熔爐製造。）

original: Tamriel is a dangerous place. Protect your horse from danger with this beautiful handcrafted armor.  (Obtained via hostler at any stable.)
string: 泰姆瑞爾是個危險的地方。用這套精美的手工護甲好好保護你的馬匹。（可透過任何馬廄的馬夫獲得。）

original: Includes four pieces of light Dwarven Mail armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Fan Favorite" starts by reading "Arena Fan's Note" at a camp southeast of Ivarstead.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型矮人鏈甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在紫杉鎮東南邊的營地中閱讀「競技場粉絲的紙條」即可開始任務：「粉絲的最愛」。）

original: Build, upgrade, and manage your own farmstead in the heart of Whiterun. Elect a steward to oversee the day-to-day and purchase upgrades such as animal pens, windmills, apiaries and stables. Whether it's building a commercial empire, growing crops, or working with animals, there are no shortage of gameplay options here. Created by Virginia "Steelfeathers" Smith. (Quest "The Unquiet Dead" starts by investigating Goldenhills Plantation east of Rorikstead.)
string: 在白漫城中心建造、升級並管理你自己的農場。指派一個總管負責監督日常工作，並購入畜欄、風車磨坊、養蜂室和馬廄等升級。無論你想建立商業帝國、種植農作物，還是照顧動物，這裡都有玩不完的內容。作者：Virginia Smith（Steelfeathers）。（調查洛利克鎮東邊的金丘農園，即可開始任務：「不寧亡者」。）

original: Includes four pieces of light Dragonscale armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.   (Quest "Tilted Scales" starts by reading "The Crimson Dirks, v4" in Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型龍鱗護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。   （在風舵城的燭爐堂客棧閱讀「緋紅匪幫，卷四」即可開始任務：「斜鱗退散」。）

original: Shanties from across Tamriel sing of Cyrus, the hero of Stros M'Kai.  Some believe he ventured north, on the legendary ship Dead Man's Dread. Find the lost ship, retrieve the treasures of Cyrus, and learn the fate of its crew. Includes two weapons, multiple new outfits, as well as naval home. Quest created by Kris Takahashi. Additional art support by Elianora. (Quest "The Restless" starts by reading the book "The Restless" at The Winking Skeever in Solitude.)
string: 泰姆瑞爾各地的船員都會歌頌斯圖爾斯．邁凱英雄賽勒斯。有人認為他開著傳奇的亡者之懼號往北航行。找到那艘失落的船，取得賽勒斯的寶藏，並查出船員最後的命運。內含兩把全新武器、數套全新服裝，以及一個海上之家。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。協力美術支援：Elianora。（在獨孤城的眨眼惡鼠閱讀書本「不寧之徒」即可開始任務：「不寧之徒」。）

original: Includes four pieces of light Leather armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Doubled-Edged" starts by reading "Zaharia's Note" at the Cliffside Retreat south of Dragon Bridge.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的輕型革製護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在龍橋鎮南邊的崖邊巢窟閱讀「札哈利亞的紙條」即可開始任務：「雙面刃」。）

original: You do not currently own a horse.
Tamriel is a dangerous place. Protect your horse from danger with this beautiful handcrafted armor.  (Obtained via hostler at any stable.)
string: 泰姆瑞爾是個危險的地方。用這套精美的手工護甲好好保護你的馬匹。（可透過任何馬廄的馬夫獲得。）

original: The legendary Imperial relic known as The Lord's Mail is rumored to be in the possession of Redguard mercenaries. The Imperial Legion has ordered you to retrieve it by any means. (Quest "Gift of Kynareth" starts by reading "Letter to General Tullius" at Castle Dour in Solitude.)
string: 據說傳奇帝國聖器聖主鏈甲現在落到紅衛人傭兵團手中。帝國軍團下令要你不擇手段奪回聖主鏈甲。（在獨孤城的陰鬱堡閱讀「給圖留斯將軍的信」即可開始任務：「凱娜瑞絲的饋贈」。）

original: Tundra Homestead provides a cozy cottage just outside Whiterun. Complete with crafting stations and fully furnished, this home is a quiet getaway from adventuring. Full support for spouses and adopted children included.  Created by Elianora. (Home outside the city is purchased from the Jarl's Steward in Dragonsreach.)
string: 苔原莊園將在白漫城外圍新增一間舒適的小屋，內含製造工作站和完整裝潢，適合在冒險之餘在此尋一刻寧靜。完整支援配偶和養子女。作者：Elianora。（城外的住宅可向龍臨堡的領主總管購買。）
這道門在其他地方開啟了。

original: From Iron to Dragonplate, this creation offers fifteen gauntlet variants that can be crafted, purchased, or found in the world. Each pair has been affixed with spikes, blades, or horns to give impact to your unarmed attacks.  Mix and match with existing armors to diversify your look! Created by Hothtrooper44. (Items appear at vendors, in chests, and can be crafted at any forge.)
string: 這個創作新增了十五款腕甲，可供製造、購買或於世界中獲得，材質從鐵到龍骨，應有盡有。腕甲上裝有尖刺、刀鋒或利角，讓你的徒手攻擊更具衝擊性。任意搭配現有的護甲，展現各式造型！作者：Hothtrooper44。（物品會出現於商人貨品和寶箱中，也可透過任意熔爐製造。）

original: In the forests of Falkreath lies a mysterious altar, promising the gift of a single boon. Walk the path that reflects your desire - or lack thereof - and embark on a unique adventure based on that choice. Discover the fabled Bittercup and three separate quests! Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "A Dying Wish" starts by reading "Mysterious Altar" at Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath.)
string: 佛克瑞斯的森林中有一個神秘聖壇，據說可以給予一個饋贈。根據你的欲望或無欲無求的心境，選擇要走的路，踏上獨特的旅程。挖掘傳說中的苦之杯和三個不同的任務！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在佛克瑞斯的亡者之飲客棧閱讀「神秘聖壇」即可開始任務：「垂死的願望」。）

original: Includes two pieces of heavy Daedric armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Beyond the Grave" starts by reading "Death of a Crimson Dirk" in Dragonreach Dungeon in Whiterun.)
string: 內含兩件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型魔族護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在白漫城的龍臨城地牢閱讀「緋紅匪幫之死」即可開始任務：「在墳墓之外」。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Silver armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "When the Cat's Away" starts by reading "M'Sharra's Diary" at The Bannered Mare in Whiterun.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型銀製護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在白漫城的敕旗母馬客棧閱讀「姆夏拉的日記」即可開始任務：「山中無老虎」。)

original: Symbol of office for the Madgod Sheogorath, this grotesque staff has the power to stop opponents in their tracks. Also included is a bonus artifact, the Fork of Horripilation.  (Quest "Put a Fork in it" starts by reading a "Mysterious Note" at The Retching Netch in Raven Rock.)
string: 這把怪誕的法杖是瘋神謝爾格拉權力的象徵，能讓對手望而生畏。內含額外神器：寒毛之叉。（在鴉石鎮的嘔吐耐區閱讀「神秘的紙條」即可開始任務：「叉強人意」。）

original: Includes four pieces of heavy Steel armor as featured in The Elder Scrolls: Blades! Quest by Kris Takahashi. (Quest "Over the Edge" starts by reading "Suicide at Dragon Bridge" in Four Shields Tavern at Dragon Bridge.)
string: 內含四件於《The Elder Scrolls: Blades》登場的重型鋼製護甲！任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在龍橋鎮的四盾牌酒館閱讀「龍橋自殺事件」即可開始任務：「高處墜落」。）

original: Despite their losses, the Mythic Dawn continue to serve Lord Dagon in the shadows, in search of a new gate, and a different ending. Features brand new enemies, locations, weapons, flora, and a conjurable Daedric Horse, all contained in a multi-layered adventure! Created by Rob Vogel "fadingsignal" (Quest "The Cause" starts by reading the "Stranger's Plea" delivered by courier upon reaching level 46.)
string: 儘管破曉神教死傷無數，但依舊在暗影之中服侍著主人大袞，尋找著新的大門和不同的結局。內含全新敵人、地點、武器、植物和可召喚的魔族馬匹，全部包裝在富有深度的冒險體驗！作者：Rob Vogel（fadingsignal）（等級達到46後閱讀信使寄送的「陌生人的求助」即可開始任務：「志業」。）

original: You do not have enough gold.

While Stendarr may offer mercy, the Vigilant have none to spare. Among the ranks of these holy warriors are armored paladins who shed their priestly robes for hide and steel. Collect and craft four unique armor sets and deliver Stendarr's justice to both the abominations and those corrupted by them. Created by Maty743. Quest created by Kris Takahashi.  (Quest "Unholy Vigil" starts by reading the "Letter to Keeper Carcette" in the Hall of the Vigilant south of Dawnstar.)
string: 即使斯坦德爾慈悲，警戒者也不會有絲毫憐憫之心。這群聖戰士之中有身穿護甲的聖殿騎士，他們脫下祭司的長袍，改穿皮革和金屬製的護甲。收集並製造四套獨特護甲套，並向不潔生物與受之污染的人執行斯坦德爾的正義。作者：Maty743。任務作者：Kris Takahashi。（在晨星城南邊的警戒者之家閱讀「致守護者凱西提的信」即可開始任務：「不潔的守夜」。）
